 11571                                  do_write:
 11572 00000B90 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 11573 00000B94 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 11574 00000B96 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11575 00000B9A 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 11576                                  do_norm:
 11577 00000B9C E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11578 00000B9F EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11579                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11580                                  
 11581                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11582                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11583                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11584                                  
 11585                                  doverify:
 11586 00000BA1 58                      		pop	ax
 11587 00000BA2 50                      		push	ax
 11588 00000BA3 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11589 00000BA5 E89000                  		call	fastspeed
 11590 00000BA8 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11591                                  
 11592                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11593                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11594                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11595                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11596                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11597                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11598                                  
 11599 00000BAA 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11600 00000BAD 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11601 00000BAF FF0E[2305]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11602 00000BB3 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11603 00000BB5 E83305                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11604 00000BB8 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11605                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11606                                  
 11607                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.
 11608 00000BBA E82E05                  		call	ResetDisk
 11609 00000BBD FF0E[2105]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11610 00000BC1 EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11611                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11612                                  
 11613                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11614                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11615                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11616                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11617                                  
 11618                                  dskerr:
 11619 00000BC3 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 11620 00000BC8 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11621 00000BCA E8F80C                  		call	checkio
 11622                                  dskerr_nochangeline:
 11623 00000BCD 803E[2505]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11624 00000BD2 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11625 00000BD4 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11626 00000BD7 C606[2505]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11627                                  dochkagain:
 11628 00000BDC E8A900                  		call	again
 11629                                  dskerr0:
 11630 00000BDF 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11631 00000BE1 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11632                                  					; fnon_removable
 11633 00000BE6 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11634 00000BE8 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11635 00000BEB 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11636                                  skip_timeout_chk:
 11637 00000BED 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11638 00000BF0 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11639 00000BF2 C706[2305]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11640                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11641                                  dskerr1:
 11642 00000BF8 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11643                                  		;jmp	retry
 11644                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11645 00000BF9 E900FF                  		jmp	_retry
 11646                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11647                                  
 11648                                  write_fault_err:
 11649 00000BFC BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11650                                  					; for write fault error.
 11651 00000BFF EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11652                                  
 11653                                  		; fall into harderr
 11654                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11655                                  
 11656                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11657                                  
 11658                                  harderr:
 11659 00000C01 E84C00                  		call	maperror
 11660                                  harderr2:
 11661 00000C04 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11662                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11663 00000C09 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11664 00000C0D 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11665                                  
 11666                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11667                                  
 11668                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11669                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11670 00000C11 E917FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11671                                  
 11672                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11673                                  
 11674                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11675                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11676                                  
 11677                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11678                                  normspeed:
 11679 00000C14 803E[2706]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11680 00000C19 751D                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11681 00000C1B 06                      		push	es
 11682 00000C1C 50                      		push	ax
 11683 00000C1D A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11684 00000C20 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11685 00000C24 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11686 00000C28 58                      		pop	ax
 11687 00000C29 07                      		pop	es
 11688 00000C2A E80B00                  		call	fastspeed
 11689                                  		; 24/12/2023
 11690                                  		;push	es
 11691                                  		;les	si, [dpt]
 11692                                  		;mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11693                                  		;			; 1 is fast settle value
 11694                                  		;pop	es
 11695 00000C2D 1E                      		push	ds
 11696 00000C2E C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11697 00000C32 C6440901                		mov	byte [si+9], 1
 11698 00000C36 1F                      		pop	ds
 11699                                  
 11700 00000C37 C3                      		retn
 11701                                  
 11702                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11703                                  
 11704                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11705                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11706                                  
 11707                                  fastspeed:
 11708 00000C38 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11709                                  					; ftoobig
 11710 00000C3D 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11711 00000C3F 06                      		push	es
 11712 00000C40 8E06[2605]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11713 00000C44 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11714 00000C46 8C06[2605]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11715 00000C4A 07                      		pop	es
 11716 00000C4B C3                      		retn
 11717                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11718                                  
 11719                                  notready:
 11720 00000C4C F9                      		stc
 11721 00000C4D B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11722 00000C4F C3                      		retn
 11723                                  
 11724                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11725                                  
 11726                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11727                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11728                                  
 11729                                  maperror:
 11730 00000C50 51                      		push	cx
 11731 00000C51 06                      		push	es
 11732 00000C52 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11733 00000C53 07                      		pop	es
 11734 00000C54 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11735 00000C56 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11736                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 11737 00000C59 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11738                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11739 00000C5C BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11740 00000C5F F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11741                                  		; 02/09/2023
 11742                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 11743                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11744 00000C61 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11745                                  					; get translation
 11746                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11747                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11748 00000C64 07                      		pop	es
 11749 00000C65 59                      		pop	cx
 11750 00000C66 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11751 00000C67 C3                      		retn
 11752                                  
 11753                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11754                                  
 11755                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11756                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11757                                  
 11758                                  set_tim:
 11759 00000C68 50                      		push	ax
 11760 00000C69 E8AFF8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11761                                  
 11762                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11763                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11764                                  
 11765 00000C6C 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11766 00000C70 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11767 00000C72 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11768                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11769                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11770 00000C76 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11771                                  setaccess:
 11772 00000C78 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11773 00000C7D 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11774 00000C81 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11775                                  done_set:
 11776 00000C85 F8                      		clc
 11777                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11778 00000C86 58                      		pop	ax
 11779 00000C87 C3                      		retn
 11780                                  
 11781                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11782                                  
 11783                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11784                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11785                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11786                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11787                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11788                                  
 11789                                  again:	
 11790 00000C88 E86004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11791 00000C8B 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11792 00000C8E 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11793                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11794 00000C90 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11795 00000C91 C3                      		retn
 11796                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11797                                  
 11798                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 11799 00000C92 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11800 00000C94 C3                      		retn

 11814                                  ;
 11815                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11816                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11817                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11818                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed

 11820                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -

 11822                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 11906                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11907                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11908                                  ;
 11909                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11910                                  ;
 11911                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11912                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11913                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11914                                  ;
 11915                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11916                                  
 11917                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11918                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11919                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11920 00000CC5 E8A2F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11921 00000CC8 06                      		push	es
 11922 00000CC9 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11923 00000CCD 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11924                                  					; RAWIO
 11925 00000CD2 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11926 00000CD6 07                      		pop	es
 11927 00000CD7 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11928                                  
 11929                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11930                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11931                                  
 11932                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11933 00000CD9 BE[960C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11934                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11935                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11936 00000CDC A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11937 00000CDE 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11938                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11939 00000CE0 BE[A90C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11940                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11941                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11942                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11943 00000CE3 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11944 00000CE5 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11945 00000CE7 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11946 00000CEA 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11947 00000CEC 98                      		cbw
 11948 00000CED D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11949 00000CEF 46                      		inc	si
 11950 00000CF0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11951 00000CF2 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11952                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11953 00000CF5 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11954                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11955                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11956 00000CFA B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11957 00000CFC C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11958                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11959                                  
 11960                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11961                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11962                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11963 00000CFD 5A                      		pop	dx
 11964                                  
 11965                                  IoctlFuncErr:				
 11966 00000CFE E9D4F3                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

 11968                                  
 11969                                  ; 16/10/2022

 11971                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11972                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11973                                  ;
 11974                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11975                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11976                                  ;
 11977                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11978                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11979                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11980                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11981                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11982                                  
 11983                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11984                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11985                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11986                                  
 11987 00000D01 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11988 00000D05 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11989                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11990 00000D08 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11991 00000D0C 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11992 00000D0F 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11993 00000D13 83E003                  		and	ax, 3		; fnon_removable+fchangeline
 11994                                  					; Mask off other bits
 11995 00000D16 894702                  		mov	[bx+2],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES]
 11996 00000D19 268B4525                		mov	ax, [es:di+37]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11997 00000D1D 894704                  		mov	[bx+4],	ax	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 11998 00000D20 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Set media type to default
 11999 00000D22 884706                  		mov	[bx+6],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_MEDIATYPE]
 12000                                  					
 12001                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 12002 00000D25 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 12003 00000D28 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12004                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB

 12204                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12205                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12206                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12207                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12208                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12209                                  ;
 12210                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12211                                  ;
 12212                                  ; output:
 12213                                  ;	for status call:
 12214                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12215                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12216                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12217                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12218                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12219                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12220                                  ;
 12221                                  ;	for format track:
 12222                                  ;		carry set if error
 12223                                  ;
 12224                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12225                                  
 12226                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12227                                  
 12228                                  		; 19/10/2022

 12378                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12379                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12380                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12381                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12382                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12383                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12384                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be

 12403                                  					; fnon_removable

 12491                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12492                                  
 12493                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12494                                  
 12495                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12496                                  ;
 12497                                  ; TrackIo:
 12498                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12499                                  ;
 12500                                  ;   input:
 12501                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12502                                  ;		  3 = write
 12503                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12504                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12505                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12506                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12507                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12508                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12509                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12510                                  ;
 12511                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12512                                  
 12513                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12514                                  		
 12515                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12516                                  TrackIo:	
 12517                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12518 00000F77 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12519 00000F7B E84EF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12520 00000F7E 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12521                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12522 00000F83 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12523 00000F85 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12524 00000F86 51                      		push	cx
 12525 00000F87 E8CEFA                  		call	iosetup
 12526 00000F8A 59                      		pop	cx
 12527 00000F8B 58                      		pop	ax
 12528                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 12529 00000F8C BE[2A05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 12530 00000F8F D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12531 00000F91 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12532 00000F93 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12533                                  
 12534                                  		; WE WANT:
 12535                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12536                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12537                                  		
 12538 00000F95 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12539                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12540 00000F98 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 12541                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12542                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12543 00000F9D 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12544                                  		
 12545 00000F9F 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 12546                                  ionextsector:

 12548 00000FA2 52                      		push	dx
 12549 00000FA3 46                      		inc	si
 12550 00000FA4 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 12551                                  					; the track table
 12552 00000FA5 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 12553 00000FA6 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12554                                  
 12555                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12556                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12557                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12558                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12559                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12560                                  		
 12561                                  		; 12/12/2022

 12564                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 12565 00000FAE 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 12566                                  		; 12/12/2022

 12569                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12570 00000FB5 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12571 00000FB7 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12572 00000FBB 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12573 00000FBD E81CFB                  		call	Disk
 12574 00000FC0 5A                      		pop	dx
 12575 00000FC1 59                      		pop	cx
 12576 00000FC2 F8                      		clc
 12577 00000FC3 C3                      		retn
 12578                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12579                                  
 12580                                  IoRemovable:				
 12581 00000FC4 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12582                                  					; table	and save it

 12586 00000FC8 50                      		push	ax

 12588                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data

 12590 00000FD1 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 12591 00000FD4 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12592 00000FD7 58                      		pop	ax
 12593 00000FD8 1F                      		pop	ds

 12618                                  					; entries in Dpt.

 12621                                  NoNeedDone2:

 12624                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12625                                  
 12626                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12627                                  ;
 12628                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12629                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12630                                  ; are permissible.
 12631                                  ;
 12632                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12633                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12634                                  ; All other registers preserved

 12644                                  ;		retn

 12665                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12666                                  ;
 12667                                  ; SetDASD
 12668                                  ;
 12669                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 12670                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 12671                                  ;
 12672                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 12673                                  ;
 12674                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12675                                  
 12676                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12677                                  SetDasd:
 12678 00000FFA 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 12679                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12680 00000FFF 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12681                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12682 00001001 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 12683                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12684                                  					; set_dasd_true
 12685 00001006 7446                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 12686                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12687 00001008 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 12688                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12689                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 12690                                  DoSetDasd:
 12691 0000100D C606[2806]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 12692 00001012 C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 12693 00001017 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 12694                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12695 00001019 268A6522                		mov	ah, [es:di+22h] ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12696 0000101D 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
 12697                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12698                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 12699 00001020 7414                    		jz	short DoSet
 12700                                  		; 24/12/2023
 12701 00001022 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 12702                                  		;cmp	ah, 1
 12703 00001024 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al	; 1
 12704                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12705                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 12706                                  		;jz	short GotBig
 12707                                  		; 24/12/2023
 12708                                  		;mov	al, 1
 12709                                  		;jmp	short DoSet
 12710                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12711 00001026 750E                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12712                                  GotBig:
 12713                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12714                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12715 00001028 40                      		inc	ax  ; mov al, 2
 12716 00001029 803E[2606]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12717 0000102E 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12718                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12719                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12720                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 12721                                  		; 18/12/2022

 12723 00001031 C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h

 12726 00001037 56                      		push	si
 12727

 12729                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12730 00001038 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12731 0000103A 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si	; 0
 12732                                  
 12733 0000103C C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 12734                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 12735                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 12736                                  
 12737 00001040 C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 12738                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12739 00001044 5E                      		pop	si
 12740 00001045 1F                      		pop	ds
 12741 00001046 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12742 00001048 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12743 0000104C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12744                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12745                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12746 0000104E 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12747 00001052 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 12748 00001056 C3                      		retn
 12749                                  
 12750                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12751                                  
 12752                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12753                                  
 12754                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12755                                  ;
 12756                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12757                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12758                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12759                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12760                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12761                                  ;
 12762                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12763                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12764                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12765                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12766                                  ;
 12767                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12768                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12769                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12770                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12771                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12772                                  ;
 12773                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12774                                  
 12775                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12776                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12777 00001057 51                      		push	cx
 12778 00001058 52                      		push	dx
 12779                                  
 12780                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12781                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12782                                  
 12783 00001059 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12784 0000105E 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12785 00001060 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12786 00001062 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12787 00001067 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12788 00001069 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12789                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12790                                  
 12791                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12792 0000106B 06                      		push	es
 12793 0000106C 56                      		push	si
 12794                                  		
 12795                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12796                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12797 0000106D 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12798 0000106F 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12799                                  
 12800 00001071 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12801                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12802                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12803 00001076 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12804 0000107A 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12805                                  
 12806                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12807                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12808                                  
 12809 0000107E 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12810 00001083 5E                      		pop	si
 12811 00001084 07                      		pop	es
 12812                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 12813 00001085 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12814 00001089 49                      		dec	cx
 12815 0000108A 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12816 0000108D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12817 0000108F D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12818 00001091 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12819 00001093 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12820 00001097 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12821 0000109B 06                      		push	es
 12822 0000109C 1E                      		push	ds
 12823 0000109D 56                      		push	si
 12824 0000109E 57                      		push	di
 12825 0000109F B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12826 000010A1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12827                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12828 000010A3 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12829 000010A5 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12830 000010AA 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12831 000010AC 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12832                                  
 12833                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12834                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12835 000010AD 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12836 000010AF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12837 000010B1 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12838                                  
 12839 000010B2 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12840                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12841                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12842 000010B7 8936[2906]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12843 000010BB 8C06[2B06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12844                                  
 12845                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12846                                  		;;mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12847                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12848                                  		;mov	es, si
 12849 000010BF 07                      		pop	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12850                                  
 12851                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12852 000010C0 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12853                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12854 000010C5 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12855 000010CA C606[2706]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12856                                  skip_disk_base_setting:
 12857 000010CF 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12858                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12859 000010D1 A2[2806]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12860 000010D4 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12861                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12862                                  
 12863                                  FormaStatErr:

 12914                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE

 12916                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12917                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12918                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next

 12950                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12951                                  ;
 12952                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12953                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12954                                  ;
 12955                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12956                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12957                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12958                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12959                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12960                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12961                                  ;
 12962                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12963                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12964                                  ;
 12965                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13024                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 13026                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13027                                  
 13028                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13029                                  ;
 13030                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13031                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13032                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13033                                  ;
 13034                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13035                                  
 13036                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13037                                  ioctl_getown:
 13038 00001157 E810F4                  		call	SetDrive
 13039 0000115A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13040                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13041 0000115E C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13042                                  ownloop:				
 13043 00001162 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13044 00001166 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13045                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13046 00001168 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13047                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13048                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13049 0000116D 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13050                                  getnextBDS:				
 13051 0000116F 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13052 00001172 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13053                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13054                                  
 13055                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13056                                  ;
 13057                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13058                                  ; in al to al.
 13059                                  ;
 13060                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13061                                  
 13062                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13063                                  ioctl_setown:
 13064 00001174 E8F3F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13065 00001177 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13066                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13067 0000117C E84DF7                  		call	checksingle

 13069 0000117F FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13070                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13071                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13072                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13073                                  
 13074                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13075                                  ;
 13076                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13077                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13078                                  ;
 13079                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13080                                  
 13081                                  exitown:				
 13082 00001183 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 13083                                  		; 12/12/2022

 13086                                  					; fi_am_mult

 13092                                  exitnomult:

 13095                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13096                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13097                                  		; cf=0
 13098                                  		;clc
 13099 00001199 C3                      		retn

 13158                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13159                                  ;	get media id
 13160                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13161                                  ;
 13162                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13163                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13164                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13165                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13166                                  ;
 13167                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13168                                  ;
 13169                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13170                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13171                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13172                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13173                                  ;
 13174                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13175                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13176                                  ;
 13177                                  ; LOGIC:
 13178                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13179                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13180                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13181                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13182                                  ;
 13183                                  ; {
 13184                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13185                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13186                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13187                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13188                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13189                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13190                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13191                                  ;		};
 13192                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13193                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13194                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13195                                  ;		};
 13196                                  ;	else
 13197                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13198                                  ;
 13199                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13200                                  
 13201                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13202                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13203                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13204                                  
 13205                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13206                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13207                                  GetMediaId:
 13208 000011C2 E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13209 000011C5 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13210 000011C9 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13211 000011CE E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13212 000011D1 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13213                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13214 000011D3 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13215                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13216                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13217                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13218 000011D8 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13219                                  
 13220                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13221 000011DA BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13222 000011DD 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13223                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13224                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13225 000011E0 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13226 000011E2 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13227 000011E6 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13228                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13229 000011EA 46                      		inc	si
 13230                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13231                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13232 000011EB 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13233                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13234 000011EE B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13235                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13236                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13237 000011F1 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13238                                  	
 13239                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13240                                  		; cf = 0
 13241                                  		;clc
 13242                                  
 13243 000011F3 C3                      		retn
 13244                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13245                                  
 13246                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13247                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13248 000011F4 F9                      		stc

 13251                                  		;stc
 13252                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13253                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13254 000011F7 C3                      		retn

 13256                                  
 13257                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13258                                  
 13259                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13260                                  ;  set media id
 13261                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13262                                  
 13263                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13264                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13265                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13266                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13267                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13268                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13269                                  ;
 13270                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13271                                  ;
 13272                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13273                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13274                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13275                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13276                                  ;
 13277                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13278                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13279                                  ;
 13280                                  ; logic:
 13281                                  ;
 13282                                  ; {
 13283                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13284                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13285                                  ;	BootIo;
 13286                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13287                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13288                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13289                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13290                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13291                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13292                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13293                                  ;		};
 13294                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13295                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13296                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13297                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 13298                                  ;		};
 13299                                  ;	else
 13300                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 13301                                  ;
 13302                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13303                                  
 13304                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13305                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13306                                  SetMediaId:
 13307 000011F8 E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13308 000011FB 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 13309                                  					; Logical drive	number
 13310 000011FF 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 13311 00001201 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 13312 00001206 52                      		push	dx
 13313 00001207 E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13314 0000120A 5A                      		pop	dx
 13315 0000120B 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 13316                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13317 0000120D 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13318                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13319 00001212 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 13320                                  		
 13321 00001214 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13322                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13323                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 13324                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13325 00001219 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 13326                                  
 13327 0000121B 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 13328 0000121C 57                      		push	di
 13329 0000121D 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 13330 0000121E 07                      		pop	es
 13331 0000121F BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13332 00001222 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 13333 00001226 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13334 00001229 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13335                                  
 13336                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13337                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13338                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13339                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13340                                  		;rep movsb
 13341 0000122C E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 13342                                  
 13343 0000122F 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 13344 00001230 1F                      		pop	ds
 13345 00001231 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 13346 00001232 07                      		pop	es
 13347 00001233 E892F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 13348 00001236 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 13349 00001238 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 13350 0000123D E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 13351 00001240 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 13352                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 13353                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 13354 00001245 C3                      		retn
 13355                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13358                                  ;IOCtl_If7:
 13359                                  ;		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13360                                  ;		stc
