 13366                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13367                                  
 13368                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13369                                  ;	BootIo
 13370                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13371                                  ;
 13372                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 13373                                  ;
 13374                                  ; input :
 13375                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 13376                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 13377                                  ;
 13378                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 13379                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 13380                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 13381                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 13382                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13383                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13384                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 13385                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 13386                                  ;
 13387                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13388                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 13389                                  ;
 13390                                  ; logic:
 13391                                  ;
 13392                                  ; {
 13393                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 13394                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 13395                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 13396                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 13397                                  ; }
 13398                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13399                                  
 13400                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13401                                  BootIo:	
 13402 00001246 06                      		push	es
 13403 00001247 57                      		push	di
 13404 00001248 53                      		push	bx
 13405 00001249 1E                      		push	ds
 13406 0000124A 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 13407                                  
 13408                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 13409                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 13410                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 13411                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 13412                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 13413                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 13414                                  
 13415 0000124B BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 13416 0000124E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 13417 00001250 8916[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 13418 00001254 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 13419 00001257 E8FCF6                  		call	diskio
 13420 0000125A 5B                      		pop	bx
 13421 0000125B 5F                      		pop	di
 13422 0000125C 07                      		pop	es
 13423 0000125D C3                      		retn
 13424                                  
 13425                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13426                                  
 13427                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13428                                  
 13429                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13430                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 13431                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13432                                  ;
 13433                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 13434                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 13435                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 13436                                  ; history in the flags.
 13437                                  ;
 13438                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 13439                                  ;
 13440                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 13441                                  ;
 13442                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 13443                                  ;
 13444                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13445                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 13446                                  ;
 13447                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13448                                  
 13449                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 13450 0000125E 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13451 00001262 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 13452 00001264 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 13453                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13454 00001266 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 13455                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13456                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 13457 0000126B 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13458 0000126D 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 13459 00001272 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13460 00001274 E8EA06                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 13461 00001277 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 13462                                  
 13463                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 13464                                  
 13465 00001279 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 13466 0000127B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 13467                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 13468                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 13469 0000127D 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 13470 0000127F 53                      		push	bx
 13471 00001280 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 13472                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 13473                                  					; physical drive
 13474 00001283 E8B406                  		call	set_changed_dl
 13475 00001286 5B                      		pop	bx
 13476                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 13477 00001287 C3                      		retn
 13478                                  
 13479                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13480                                  
 13481                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13482                                  
 13483                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13484                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 13485                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13486                                  ;
 13487                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13488                                  ;
 13489                                  ; INPUT :
 13490                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13491                                  ;
 13492                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 13493                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 13494                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13495                                  
 13496                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13497                                  GetAccessFlag:
 13498 00001288 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 13499 0000128C C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13500                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 13501                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13502 0000128F 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 13503                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13504 00001291 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13505                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13506                                  					; unformatted_media
 13507 00001296 7501                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 13508                                  		;inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 13509                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13510 00001298 40                      		inc	ax
 13511                                  GafDone:
 13512 00001299 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13513 0000129C C3                      		retn
 13514                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13515                                  
 13516                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13517                                  
 13518                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13519                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 13520                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13521                                  ;
 13522                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 13523                                  ;
 13524                                  ; input :
 13525                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 13526                                  ;
 13527                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 13528                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13529                                  
 13530                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13531                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 13532 0000129D C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 13533 000012A1 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13534                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13535 000012A4 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 13536                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13537                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 13538 000012A9 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 13539 000012AD 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 13540                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13541 000012AF 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 13542                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13543                                  					; unformatted_media
 13544                                  saf_Done:				
 13545 000012B4 C3                      		retn
 13546                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13550                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13551                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 13552                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13553                                  ;
 13554                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 13555                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 13556                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 13557                                  ;
 13558                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13559                                  
 13560                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13561                                  ioctl_support_query:
 13562 000012B5 06                      		push	es
 13563 000012B6 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 13564 000012BA 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 13565                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 13566                                  
 13567                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13568                                  		;cmp	al, 48h		; IOC_NEW_DC (PCDOS 7.1)
 13569                                  		;			; new generic ioctl function (FAT32)
 13570                                  		;jz	short ioctl_support
 13571                                  
 13572 000012BE 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 13573                                  					; See if major code is 8
 13574 000012C0 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 13575                                  ioctl_support:
 13576 000012C2 0E                      		push	cs
 13577 000012C3 07                      		pop	es
 13578                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13579                                  		;mov	cx, 14          ; (PCDOS 7.1) IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13580 000012C4 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 13581                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13582 000012C7 BF[BA0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 13583                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 13584                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 13585 000012CA 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 13586 000012CC F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 13587 000012CE 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 13588 000012D0 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 13589                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13590                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 13591                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 13592                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 13593                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 13594                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13595                                  ioctlsupexit:
 13596 000012D3 07                      		pop	es
 13597                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13598                                  		; cf = 0
 13599                                  		;clc
 13600 000012D4 C3                      		retn
 13601                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13602                                  nosupport:
 13603 000012D5 07                      		pop	es
 13604 000012D6 E9FCED                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 13605                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13608                                  
 13609                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13610                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 13611                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13612                                  ;
 13613                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 13614                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 13615                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 13616                                  ;	    drive)
 13617                                  ;
 13618                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 13619                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 13620                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 13621                                  ;
 13622                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 13623                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 13624                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 13625                                  ;
 13626                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 13627                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 13628                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13629                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 13630                                  ;
 13631                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 13632                                  ;
 13633                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 13634                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 13635                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 13636                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 13637                                  ; 
 13638                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13639                                  
 13640                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13641                                  SenseMediaType:				
 13642 000012D9 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 13643 000012DD C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13644                                  		; 10/10/2022
 13645                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 13646 000012E0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 13647 000012E2 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 13648                                  		;
 13649 000012E4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13650                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 13651                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13652                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 13653 000012E8 B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 13654                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 13655 000012EA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 13656 000012EC 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 13657 000012EE FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 13658                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 13659 000012F0 FEC8                    		dec	al
 13660 000012F2 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 13661 000012F4 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13662 000012F6 0404                    		add	al, 4
 13663 000012F8 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 13664 000012FA 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 13665 000012FC 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 13666 000012FE 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 13667                                  GotMediaType:				
 13668 00001300 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 13669                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13670                                  		; cf = 0
 13671                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 13672 00001303 C3                      		retn
 13673                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13674                                  
 13675                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 13676 00001304 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 13677 00001307 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 13678 00001309 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 13679 0000130B 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 13680 0000130E 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 13681                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 13682 00001310 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 13683                                  SenseErrExit:				
 13684 00001312 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 13685 00001314 F9                      		stc
 13686 00001315 C3                      		retn
 13687                                  
 13688                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13689                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13690                                  		;db    0
 13691                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13692                                  
 13693                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13694                                  
 13695                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13696                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 13697                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13698                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13699                                  
 13700                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 13701                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 13702                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 13703                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 13704                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 13705                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 13706                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 13707                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 13708                                  ;
 13709                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 13710                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 13711                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 13712                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 13713                                  ;
 13714                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 13715                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 13716                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 13717                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 13718                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 13719                                  ;
 13720                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 13721                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 13722                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 13723                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 13724                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 13725                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 13726                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 13727                                  
 13728                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 13729                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 13730                                  
 13731                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13732                                  
 13733                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 13734 00001316 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 13735 00001319 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 13736 0000131B 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 13737 0000131E 7431                    		jz	short mine
 13738                                  
 13739                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 13740                                  
 13741 00001320 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 13742 00001323 746C                    		jz	short win386call
 13743 00001325 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 13744 00001328 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 13745 0000132A E99700                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 13746                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13747                                  
 13748                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 13749 0000132D CF                      		iret
 13750                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13751                                  
 13752                                  int2f_replace_int13:
 13753 0000132E 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 13754 0000132F 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 13755                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 13756                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 13757                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 13758 00001331 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 13759                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13760                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 13761                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 13762                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 13763                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 13764                                  		
 13765                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 13766                                  		;push	word [Orig13]
 13767 00001336 FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 13768                                  		;push	word [Old13]
 13769 0000133A FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 13770                                  
 13771                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 13772                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 13773                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 13774                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 13775                                  		
 13776                                  		;mov	[Orig13], dx
 13777                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13778 0000133E 8716[B400]              		xchg	dx, [Orig13]
 13779 00001342 A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 13780                                  		;mov	[Old13], bx
 13781                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13782 00001345 871E[0601]              		xchg	bx, [Old13]
 13783 00001349 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 13784                                  
 13785 0000134D 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 13786                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13787                                  		;pop	bx
 13788 0000134E 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 13789                                  		;pop	dx ; 02/09/2023
 13790 0000134F 58                      		pop	ax
 13791                                  i2f_iret:
 13792 00001350 CF                      		iret
 13793                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13794                                  
 13795                                  mine:
 13796 00001351 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 13797 00001353 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 13798 00001355 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 13799 00001357 7503                    		jnz	short disp_func
 13800 00001359 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 13801                                  		;jmp	short i2f_iret
 13802                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13803 0000135B CF                      		iret
 13804                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13805                                  
 13806                                  disp_func:
 13807 0000135C 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1			; request for installing bds?
