 15041                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 15042                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15043                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 15044                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15045                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15046                                  
 15047                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 15048 000017C7 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15049 000017C9 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15049 000017D2 736B6574746520666F-
 15049 000017DB 7220647269766520   
 15050                                  
 15051                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15052 000017E3 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15052 000017EC 65737320616E79206B-
 15052 000017F5 6579207768656E2072-
 15052 000017FE 656164790D0A       
 15053 00001804 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15054                                  
 15055                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15056                                  
 15057                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15058                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15059                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15060                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15061                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15062                                  
 15063                                  chkopcnt:		
 15064 00001806 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15065 0000180B C3                      		retn
 15066                                  
 15067                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15068                                  
 15069                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15070                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15071                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15072                                  ;
 15073                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15074                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15075                                  
 15076                                  mediacheck:	
 15077 0000180C E8BDF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15078 0000180F 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15079 00001811 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15080 00001814 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15081 00001816 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15082 00001819 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15083 0000181B 50                      		push	ax
 15084 0000181C 52                      		push	dx
 15085 0000181D 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15086                                  					; set logical drive number
 15087 00001821 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15088 00001823 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15089                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15090                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15091 00001825 5A                      		pop	dx
 15092 00001826 58                      		pop	ax
 15093 00001827 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15094 00001829 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15095                                  
 15096                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15097                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15098                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15099                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15100                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15101                                  ; status.
 15102                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15103 0000182C 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15104 00001830 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15105                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15106                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15107                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15108                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15109 00001834 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15110                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15111                                  
 15112                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15113                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15114                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15115                                  
 15116 00001836 50                      		push	ax
 15117 00001837 51                      		push	cx
 15118 00001838 52                      		push	dx
 15119 00001839 E8B4ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15120 0000183C 5A                      		pop	dx
 15121 0000183D 59                      		pop	cx
 15122 0000183E 58                      		pop	ax
 15123 0000183F 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15124 00001841 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15125                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15126 00001843 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15127                                  mediaret:				
 15128 00001845 C3                      		retn
 15129                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15130                                  
 15131                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15132                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15133                                  ; or write.
 15134                                  
 15135                                  mediadovolid:				
 15136 00001846 E847EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15137 00001849 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15138 0000184B E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15139 0000184E 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15140 00001850 E9FDF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15141                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15142                                  
 15143                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15144                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15145                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15146                                  ; dos.
 15147                                  ;
 15148                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15149                                  
 15150                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15151                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15152                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15153                                  
 15154                                  checklatchio:	
 15155                                  
 15156                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15157                                  			
 15158 00001853 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15159 00001856 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15160                                  
 15161                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15162                                  
 15163 00001858 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15164 0000185B 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15165                                  
 15166                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15167                                  ; expensive verification.
 15168                                  
 15169 0000185D E830EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15170 00001860 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15171 00001862 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15172 00001865 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15173 00001867 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15174 00001869 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15175 0000186B E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15176                                  checklatchret:				
 15177 0000186E E8DFF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15178                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15179 00001871 F9                      		stc
 15180 00001872 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15181                                  checkret:				
 15182 00001873 C3                      		retn
 15183                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15184                                  
 15185                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15186                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15187                                  ;
 15188                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15189                                  
 15190                                  checkfatvid:				
 15191 00001874 E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15192 00001877 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15193 00001879 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15194                                  
 15195                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15196                                  
 15197                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15198                                  
 15199                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15200                                  
 15201                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15202                                  ;
 15203                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15204                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15205                                  ;
 15206                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15207                                  ;
 15208                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15209                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15210                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15211                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15212                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15213                                  ;
 15214                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15215                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15216                                  ; routine.)
 15217                                  ;
 15218                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15219                                  
 15220                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15221                                  check_vid:
 15222                                  
 15223                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15224                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15225                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15226                                  
 15227 0000187B 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15228                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15229                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15230 00001880 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15231 00001882 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15232 00001885 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15233 00001887 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15234 00001889 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15235                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15236 0000188E 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15237                                  					; if not fat system
 15238 00001890 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15239 00001893 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15240 00001895 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15241 00001898 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15242                                  					; definitely changed
 15243 0000189B 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15244                                  
 15245 0000189D 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15246                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15247 0000189E E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15248                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15249                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15250                                  		;clc
 15251                                  checkfatret:				
 15252 000018A1 C3                      		retn
 15253                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15254                                  
 15255                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15256                                  changed_drv:
 15257 000018A2 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15258 000018A3 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15259                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15260 000018A8 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15261                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15262                                  
 15263                                  ; extended id check
 15264                                  
 15265                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15266                                  
 15267                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15268                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15269                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15270                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15271                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15272                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15273                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15274                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15275                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15276                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15277                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15278                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15279                                  ;
 15280                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15281                                  
 15282                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15283                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15284 000018A9 50                      		push	ax
 15285                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15286                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15287 000018AA A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15288                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15289 000018AD 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15290 000018AF 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15291 000018B3 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15292 000018B5 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15293 000018B8 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 15294 000018BC 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15295                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 15296                                  					; don't know
 15297 000018BE 58                      		pop	ax
 15298 000018BF EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 15299                                  					; reset the flag
 15300                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15301                                  
 15302                                  ext_changed:
 15303 000018C1 58                      		pop	ax
 15304                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15305 000018C2 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 15306                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15307                                  					; disk changed!
 15308                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15309                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 15310                                  		;clc
 15311 000018C3 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 15312                                  
 15313                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15314                                  
 15315                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 15316                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 15317                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 15318                                  ;
 15319                                  ; es:di -> bds
 15320                                  
 15321                                  checkio:				
 15322 000018C5 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 15323 000018C8 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 15324 000018CA E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15325 000018CD 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 15326 000018CF E8BEED                  		call	GetBp
 15327 000018D2 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 15328 000018D4 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 15329 000018D7 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 15330 000018D9 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15331 000018DB 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 15332 000018DD 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 15333 000018DE C3                      		retn
 15334                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15335                                  
 15336                                  checkioerr:				
 15337 000018DF E80700                  		call	returnvid
 15338                                  
 15339                                  checkioret:				
 15340 000018E2 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 15341 000018E3 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr
 15342                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15343                                  
 15344                                  no_error_map:				
 15345 000018E6 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr2
 15346                                  
 15347                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15348                                  
 15349                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 15350                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 15351                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 15352                                  
 15353                                  returnvid:		
 15354 000018E9 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 15355                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 15356 000018EC E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 15357 000018EF B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 15358 000018F1 F9                      		stc
 15359 000018F2 C3                      		retn
 15360                                  
 15361                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15362                                  
 15363                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 15364                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 15365                                  ;
 15366                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 15367                                  ; **trashes si**
 15368                                  
 15369                                  media_set_vid:				
 15370 000018F3 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 15371                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 15372                                  
 15373                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 15374                                  
 15375                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15376                                  
 15377                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 15378                                  
 15379                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15380                                  vid_into_packet:
 15381 000018F6 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 15382 000018F7 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 15383 000018FB 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15384 000018FE 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 15385 00001900 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15386 00001903 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 15387 00001906 1F                      		pop	ds
 15388                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 15389 00001907 C3                      		retn
 15390                                  
 15391                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15392                                  
 15393                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15394                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 15395                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 15396                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 15397                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 15398                                  ;
 15399                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 15400                                  ;		ah has media byte
 15401                                  ;
 15402                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 15403                                  ;		    no registers modified
 15404                                  ;		carry set
 15405                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 15406                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 15407                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 15408                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15409                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15410                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15411                                  ;
 15412                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15413                                  
 15414                                  hidensity:
 15415                                  
 15416                                  ; check for correct drive
 15417                                  		
 15418                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15419 00001908 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15420                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15421                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15422 0000190D 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15423                                  
 15424                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15425                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15426                                  
 15427 0000190F 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15428 00001914 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15429                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15430                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15431 00001916 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15432 00001919 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15433                                  
 15434                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15435                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15436                                  
 15437                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15438 0000191B 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15439 0000191F 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15440                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15441                                  					; ffOther
 15442 00001921 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15443 00001923 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15444                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15445                                  					; ff288
 15446 00001925 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15447 00001927 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15448 00001929 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15449                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15450                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15451 0000192C B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15452                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15453                                  					; 2 sides
 15454                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15455 0000192F 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15456 00001930 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15457                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15458                                  					; & head max
 15459                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15460 00001933 E9C6ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15461                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15462                                  
 15463                                  Is720K:
 15464                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15465 00001936 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15466                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15467 00001937 E98CED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15468                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15469                                  
 15470                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15471                                  ;dofloppy:
 15472                                  		;retn
 15473                                  
 15474                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15475                                  
 15476                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15477                                  
 15478                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15479                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15480                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15481                                  ;
 15482                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15483                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15484                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15485                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15486                                  ;
 15487                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15488                                  ;
 15489                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15490                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15491                                  
 15492                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15493 0000193A 06                      		push	es
 15494 0000193B 57                      		push	di
 15495                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15496                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15497 0000193C C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15498                                  
 15499                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15500                                  
 15501                                  scan_bds:				
 15502 00001940 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15503 00001944 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15504                                  
 15505                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15506                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15507                                  
 15508 00001946 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15509                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15510                                  get_next_bds:				
 15511 0000194A 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15512                                  					; go to	next bds
 15513 0000194D 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15514 00001950 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15515 00001952 5F                      		pop	di
 15516 00001953 07                      		pop	es
 15517 00001954 C3                      		retn
 15518                                  
 15519                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15520                                  
 15521                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15522                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15523                                  ;
 15524                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15525                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15526                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15527                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15528                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15529                                  
 15530                                  checkromchange:	
 15531                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15532                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15533 00001955 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15534                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15535                                  					; fchanged
 15536 0000195A C3                      		retn
 15537                                  
 15538                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15539                                  
 15540                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15541                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15542                                  ;
 15543                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15544                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15545                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15546                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15547                                  
 15548                                  resetchanged:	
 15549                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15550                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15551 0000195B 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15552                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15553                                  					; ~fchanged
 15554 00001960 C3                      		retn
 15555                                  
 15556                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15557                                  
 15558                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15559                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15560                                  ;
 15561                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15562                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15563                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15564                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15565                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15566                                  
 15567                                  haschange:
 15568                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15569                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15570 00001961 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15571                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15572                                  					; fchangeline
 15573 00001966 C3                      		retn
 15574                                  
 15575                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15576                                  
 15577                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15578                                  
 15579                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15580                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15581                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15582                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15583                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15584                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15585                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15586                                  
 15587                                  ; set_volume_id
 15588                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15589                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15590                                  ;
 15591                                  ;   on entry:
 15592                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15593                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15594                                  ;
 15595                                  ;   on exit:
 15596                                  ;	carry clear:
 15597                                  ;	   successful call
 15598                                  ;	carry set
 15599                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15600                                  
 15601                                  set_volume_id:				
 15602 00001967 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15603 00001968 50                      		push	ax
 15604 00001969 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15605 0000196C 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15606 0000196E E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15607 00001971 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15608 00001973 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15609 00001976 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15610                                  setvret:				
 15611                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15612                                  		; cf = 0
 15613                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15614 00001979 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15615 0000197A 5A                      		pop	dx
 15616 0000197B C3                      		retn
 15617                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15618                                  
 15619                                  seterr:					
 15620 0000197C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15621 0000197D 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15622 0000197E C3                      		retn
 15623                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15624 0000197F 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15625                                  
 15626                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15627                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15628                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15629                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15630                                  
 15631                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15632                                  
 15633                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15634                                  
 15635                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15636                                  ;
 15637                                  ;   on entry:
 15638                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15639                                  ;
 15640                                  ;   on exit:
 15641                                  ;	carry clear
 15642                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15643                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15644                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15645                                  ;
 15646                                  ;	carry set:
 15647                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15648                                  
 15649                                  read_volume_id:
 15650 00001981 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15651 00001982 51                      		push	cx
 15652 00001983 53                      		push	bx
 15653 00001984 50                      		push	ax
 15654 00001985 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15655 00001986 57                      		push	di
 15656 00001987 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15657 00001988 07                      		pop	es
 15658 00001989 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15659 0000198C BE[9508]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15660                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 15661 0000198F B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15662 00001992 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15663 00001994 5F                      		pop	di
 15664 00001995 07                      		pop	es
 15665 00001996 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15666                                  					; # of fats
 15667 0000199A 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15668                                  					; sectors / fat
 15669 0000199E F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15670 000019A0 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15671                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15672                                  					;
 15673                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15674                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15675 000019A4 2EA3[7F19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15676                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15677                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15678 000019A8 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15679                                  					; # root dir entries
 15680 000019AC B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15681 000019AE D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15682                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15683                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15684 000019B0 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15685                                  next_sec:
 15686 000019B1 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15687 000019B2 2EA1[7F19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15688                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15689                                  					; get sector #
 15690 000019B6 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15691                                  					; sectors / track
 15692 000019BA 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15693 000019BC F7F1                    		div	cx
 15694                                  
 15695                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15696                                  
 15697 000019BE 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15698                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15699 000019BF 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15700 000019C1 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15701 000019C3 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15702                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15703 000019C7 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15704 000019C9 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15705 000019CB E83CEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15706                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15707 000019CE 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15708 000019D0 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15709 000019D3 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15710                                  fvid_loop:
 15711                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15712 000019D5 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 15713                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15714 000019D7 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15715 000019D9 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15716 000019DC 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15717 000019DE 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15718 000019E1 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15719                                  ent_loop:
 15720 000019E3 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15721 000019E6 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15722 000019E8 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15723 000019E9 2EFF06[7F19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15724                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15725                                  					; next sector
 15726 000019EE E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15727                                  notfound:
 15728                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15729                                  		;xor	si, si
 15730 000019F0 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15731                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15732                                  
 15733                                  found_vid:
 15734                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15735                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 15736 000019F2 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15737 000019F3 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15738 000019F5 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15739 000019F6 57                      		push	di
 15740 000019F7 1E                      		push	ds
 15741 000019F8 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15742 000019F9 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15743 000019FC B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15744                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15745 000019FF F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15746                                  		;xor	al, al
 15747                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15748 00001A01 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15749 00001A02 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15750                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15751                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15752                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15753 00001A03 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15754 00001A04 07                      		pop	es
 15755                                  fvid_ret:
 15756                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15757 00001A05 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15758                                  				
 15759 00001A07 58                      		pop	ax
 15760                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15761                                  		; cf = 0
 15762                                  		;clc
 15763                                  rvidret:
 15764 00001A08 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15765 00001A09 59                      		pop	cx
 15766 00001A0A 5A                      		pop	dx
 15767 00001A0B C3                      		retn
 15768                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15769                                  
 15770                                  no_vid:
 15771 00001A0C 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15772                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15773                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15774 00001A0D EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15775                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15776                                  
 15777                                  readviderr:
 15778 00001A0F 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15779 00001A10 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15780 00001A11 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15781                                  
 15782                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15783                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15784                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15785                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15786 00001A13 BE[A108]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15787                                  		;
 15788                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15789                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15790                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15791                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15792 00001A16 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15793 00001A19 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15794                                  		;
 15795 00001A1C FC                      		cld
 15796 00001A1D C3                      		retn
 15797                                  
 15798                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15799                                  
 15800                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15801                                  ;
 15802                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15803                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15804                                  
 15805                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15806 00001A1E 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15807                                  		;push	si
 15808 00001A1F 51                      		push	cx
 15809                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15810 00001A20 56                      		push	si
 15811                                  
 15812                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15813                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15814                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15815                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15816                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15817                                  		;cld
 15818                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15819 00001A21 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15820                                  
 15821 00001A24 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15822                                  		
 15823                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15824 00001A26 5E                      		pop	si
 15825                                  chk_volid_ok:
 15826 00001A27 59                      		pop	cx
 15827                                  		;pop	si
 15828 00001A28 5F                      		pop	di
 15829 00001A29 C3                      		retn
 15830                                  
 15831                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15832                                  
 15833                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15834                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15835                                  ;
 15836                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15837                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15838                                  
 15839                                  check_volume_id:
 15840 00001A2A 57                      		push	di
 15841 00001A2B 51                      		push	cx
 15842                                  		
 15843                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15844                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15845                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15846                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15847                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15848                                  		;cld
 15849                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15850 00001A2C E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15851                                  
 15852 00001A2F F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15853                                  		
 15854                                  		; 27/12/2023
 15855                                  		;pop	cx
 15856                                  		;pop	di
 15857                                  		;retn
 15858 00001A31 EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 15859                                  
 15860                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15861                                  
 15862                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15863                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15864                                  ;
 15865                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15866                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15867                                  ;
 15868                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15869                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15870                                  ;
 15871                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15872                                  
 15873                                  fat_check:
 15874 00001A33 50                      		push	ax
 15875 00001A34 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15876 00001A36 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15877 00001A39 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15878                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15879 00001A3D 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15880 00001A3F 4E                      		dec	si
 15881                                  okret1:
 15882 00001A40 58                      		pop	ax
 15883 00001A41 C3                      		retn
 15884                                  
 15885                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15886                                  
 15887                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS) ((& MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS)) ; 27/12/2023
 15888                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15889                                  
 15890                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15891                                  
 15892                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15893                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15894                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15895                                  
 15896                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15897                                  
 15898                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15899                                  		;db 0
 15900                                  
 15901                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15902                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15903                                  
 15904                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15905 00001A42 00<rep Eh>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15906                                  %endif
 15907                                  
 15908                                  ;align 16
 15909                                  
 15910                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15911                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15912                                  ; 29/09/2023

 15938                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
