 32322                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32323                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 32324                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 32325                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32326                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32327                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 32328                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 32329                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32330                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32331                                  
 32332                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32333                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 32334                                  findUMB:
 32335                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32336                                  	;push	ax
 32337                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32338 00002D52 51                      	push	cx ; *
 32339                                  	;push	dx
 32340                                  
 32341 00002D53 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 32342                                  
 32343 00002D55 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 32344                                  
 32345 00002D57 E8D2FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 32346                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32347                                  	;mov	es,ax ; *
 32348 00002D5A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 32349                                  
 32350                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32351                                  fu10:
 32352 00002D5C 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax ; * ; **
 32353                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32354                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 32355                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 32356                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 32357                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32358                                  
 32359                                  ;fu10:	
 32360 00002D5E 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 32361 00002D60 7417                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 32362                                  
 32363 00002D62 E8D4FE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 32364 00002D65 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 32365                                  
 32366 00002D67 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 32367                                  fu20:	
 32368                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32369                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32370                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32371 00002D68 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end 
 32372 00002D6E 7408                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 32373                                  
 32374                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 32375                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32376                                  	; ax = es
 32377                                  	;mov	ax,es ; * ; 22/07/2023
 32378                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32379 00002D70 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32380 00002D75 40                      	inc	ax
 32381                                  	; 22/07/2023
 32382                                  	;mov	es,ax ; **
 32383 00002D76 EBE4                    	jmp	short fu10
 32384                                  fuE:	
 32385 00002D78 F9                      	stc
 32386                                  fuX:
 32387                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32388                                  	;pop	dx
 32389                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32390 00002D79 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 32391                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 32392 00002D7A C3                      	retn
 32393                                  
 32394                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32395                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 32396                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32397                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32398                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 32399                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 32400                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 32401                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32402                                  
 32403                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 32404                                  BigFree:
 32405                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32406                                  	;push	bx
 32407 00002D7B 51                      	push	cx
 32408                                  
 32409 00002D7C E8D3FF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 32410 00002D7F 723A                    	jc	short bfX
 32411                                  
 32412 00002D81 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 32413 00002D83 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 32414                                  
 32415                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32416                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 32417                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 32418                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 32419                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 32420                                  
 32421                                  bf10:	
 32422 00002D85 E8B1FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 32423 00002D88 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 32424                                  
 32425                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 32426 00002D8A 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 32427 00002D90 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 32428                                  
 32429 00002D92 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32430                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 32431 00002D96 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 32432                                  	;jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 32433                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32434 00002D98 7D04                    	jge	short bf20
 32435                                  
 32436 00002D9A 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 32437                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 32438 00002D9C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32439                                  bf20:	
 32440                                  	;mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32441                                  	;cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 32442                                  	; 19/07/2023
 32443                                  	;cmp	byte [es:0],'Z'
 32444 00002D9E 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32445 00002DA4 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 32446                                  
 32447                                  	;NextMCB es,ax			; Go on forward.
 32448 00002DA6 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 32449                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 32450 00002DA8 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32451 00002DAD 40                      	inc     ax
 32452 00002DAE 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 32453                                  
 32454 00002DB0 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 32455                                  
 32456 00002DB2 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 32457 00002DB4 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 32458 00002DB6 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 32459 00002DB8 7501                    	jnz	short bfX
 32460                                  bfE:	
 32461 00002DBA F9                      	stc				; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 32462                                  bfX:
 32463 00002DBB 59                      	pop	cx
 32464                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32465                                  	;pop	bx
 32466 00002DBC C3                      	retn
 32467                                  
 32468                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32469                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 32470                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32471                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 32472                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 32473                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32474                                  ; USES:     Flags

 32478

 32480                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32481                                  	;push	ax
 32482                                  
 32483 00002DBD 30FF                    	xor	bh,bh
 32484 00002DBF 88C3                    	mov	bl,al
 32485                                  
 32486                                  	;getdata al,DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 32487                                  	;
 32488                                  	;push	ds
 32489                                  	;push	cs
 32490                                  	;pop	ds
 32491                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 32492                                  	;pop	ds
 32493                                  	
 32494                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 32495                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32496                                  	; ds = cs
 32497 00002DC1 8A87[2A1F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 32498                                  
 32499 00002DC5 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 32500                                  
 32501                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32502                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32503                                  	;pop	ax
 32504                                  
 32505 00002DC7 C3                      	retn
 32506                                  
 32507                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32508                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 32509                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32510                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 32511                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 32512                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 32513                                  ; USES:     Flags
 32514                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32515                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 32516                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 32517                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 32518                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 32519                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 32520                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32521                                  
 32522                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ 20h
 32523                                  
 32524                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32525                                  
 32526                                  shrinkMCB:
 32527                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 32528                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32529                                  	;push	bx
 32530 00002DC8 51                      	push	cx
 32531 00002DC9 06                      	push	es
 32532                                  
 32533 00002DCA 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 32534                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32535                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 32536                                  
 32537 00002DCC 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32538                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32539 00002DD1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 32540                                  
 32541 00002DD3 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32542                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 32543                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 32544                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 32545                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32546                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 32547                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32548 00002DD6 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 32549 00002DD8 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 32550                                  
 32551 00002DDA 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 32552                                  	
 32553                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32554                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32555 00002DDF 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32556                                  
 32557 00002DE1 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 32558 00002DE6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 32559                                  
 32560 00002DEC 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 32561 00002DEE 40                      	inc	ax
 32562 00002DEF 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 32563                                  
 32564 00002DF1 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 32565 00002DF3 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 32566                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32567                                  	; ax > 0
 32568 00002DF5 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 32569                                  
 32570                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32571 00002DF6 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 32572                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 32573 00002DFB 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 32574                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 32575                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 32576                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 32577                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 32578                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 32579                                  
 32580                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32581 00002DFF E8A801                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 32582                                  
 32583                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32584                                  	; cf=0
 32585                                  	;clc
 32586                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32587                                  	;jmp	short smX
 32588                                  smE:	
 32589                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32590                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 32591                                  	;stc
 32592                                  smX:	
 32593                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 32594 00002E02 07                      	pop	es
 32595 00002E03 59                      	pop	cx
 32596                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32597                                  	;pop	bx
 32598 00002E04 C3                      	retn
 32599                                  
 32600                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32601                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 32602                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32603                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 32604                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 32605                                  ; ERROR:    None
 32606                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 32607                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32608                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 32609                                  ;
 32610                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 32611                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 32612                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 32613                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 32614                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 32615                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 32616                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 32617                                  ;       Endif
 32618                                  ;    Endif
 32619                                  ; Endif
 32620                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 32621                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 32622                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 32623                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 32624                                  ;    ENDIF
 32625                                  ; ENDIF
 32626                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32627                                  
 32628                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32629                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 32630                                  _hideUMB_:
 32631                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32632                                  	; ds = cs
 32633                                  
 32634                                  	; 01/01/2023
 32635                                  	;push	bx
 32636                                  	;push	dx
 32637 00002E05 06                      	push	es
 32638                                  
 32639 00002E06 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32640 00002E08 E8B2FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 32641 00002E0B 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 32642                                  
 32643 00002E0D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 32644 00002E0F E869FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 32645 00002E12 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 32646                                  
 32647 00002E14 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 32648 00002E15 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 32649 00002E17 E8AAFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 32650 00002E1A 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 32651                                  
 32652 00002E1B 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 32653 00002E1D 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 32654                                  
 32655 00002E1F 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 32656 00002E21 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 32657                                  
 32658 00002E23 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 32659 00002E25 E81DFD                  	call	unMarkUMB
 32660 00002E28 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 32661                                  hu_10:	
 32662                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 32663                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 32664                                  	; 02/01/2023
 32665                                  ;isTiny:
 32666                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 32667                                  	;or	al,al
 32668 00002E2A 800E[261F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 32669 00002E2F 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 32670                                  
 32671 00002E31 E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 32672 00002E34 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 32673                                  
 32674 00002E36 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 32675 00002E38 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 32676                                  
 32677 00002E3A 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 32678 00002E3C E87EFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 32679 00002E3F 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 32680                                  
 32681 00002E41 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32682                                  hu_30:	
 32683 00002E43 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 32684                                  
 32685 00002E45 E89DFE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 32686                                  
 32687 00002E48 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 32688 00002E4A 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 32689                                  
 32690 00002E4C 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 32691 00002E4E E8E6FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 32692                                  hu_X:	
 32693 00002E51 07                      	pop	es
 32694                                  	; 01/01/2023

 32971

 32982                                  	;pop	bx ; ?
 32983                                  	;pop	ax ; ?
 32984

 33305                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33306                                  ;
 33307                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 33308                                  ;
 33309                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 33310                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 33311                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 33312                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 33313                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 33314                                  ;
 33315                                  ;	Output : none
 33316                                  ;
 33317                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 33318                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 33319                                  ;
 33320                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33321                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 33322                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 33323                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 33324                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 33325                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33326                                  
 33327                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33328                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33329                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 33330                                  InitDevLoad:
 33331                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33332                                  	;push	es ; *
 33333                                  
 33334                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33335                                  	; ds = cs
 33336 00002FE4 803E[7B1F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33337                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 33338                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 33339 00002FE9 7439                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 33340                                  
 33341                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33342                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33343                                  ; %if 0
 33344                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33345 00002FEB 803E[6B1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1
 33346                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 33347 00002FF0 7413                    	je	short InitForConv
 33348                                  
 33349                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 33350                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 33351                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 33352                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 33353                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 33354                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 33355                                  
 33356 00002FF2 E85704                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 33357                                  
 33358 00002FF5 E892FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 33359 00002FF8 E8CBFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 33360 00002FFB E85700                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 33361 00002FFE 9C                      	pushf
 33362 00002FFF E851FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 33363 00003002 9D                      	popf
 33364                                  	;jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 33365                                  	;jmp	short InitForHi
 33366                                  	; 06/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 33367 00003003 EB0B                    	jmp	short idl0
 33368                                  
 33369                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 33370                                  
 33371                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33372                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 33373                                  InitForConv:
 33374                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33375                                  	; ds = cs
 33376 00003005 E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 33377                                  					;  current UMB ?
 33378 00003008 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 33379 0000300A E83F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 33380 0000300D E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 33381                                  idl0: ; 06/07/2023
 33382 00003010 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 33383                                  					;  in low memory
 33384                                  InitForHi:
 33385                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33386                                  	; ds = cs
 33387                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 33388                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 33389                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 33390 00003012 A1[711F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 33391 00003015 8B16[6D1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33392 00003019 0316[6F1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 33393 0000301D EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 33394                                  
 33395                                  InitForLo:
 33396                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33397                                  	; ds = cs
 33398                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 33399 0000301F C606[7B1F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 33400                                  initforlo_x:
 33401                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33402                                  	; ds = cs
 33403                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 33404                                  					;  we are loading low
 33405                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = Start of Low memory
 33406                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 33407 00003024 A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 33408 00003027 8B16[A502]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 33409                                  idl1:
 33410 0000302B E86600                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 33411                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33412                                  	; ds = cs
 33413                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 33414                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 33415                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 33416                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 33417 0000302E A3[5F1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 33418 00003031 8916[611F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 33419 00003035 C706[631F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 33420 0000303B A3[651F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 33421                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33422                                  	;pop	es ; *
 33423 0000303E C3                      	retn
 33424                                  
 33425                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33426                                  ;
 33427                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 33428                                  ;
 33429                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 33430                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 33431                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 33432                                  ;		   current UMB
 33433                                  ;
 33434                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33435                                  
 33436                                  SpaceInUMB:
 33437                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33438                                  	; ds = cs
 33439                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 33440                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 33441                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 33442 0000303F A1[6F1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 33443 00003042 0306[6D1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 33444 00003046 2B06[711F]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 33445                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33446                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 33447                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 33448                                  	;stc
 33449                                  	;retn
 33450                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33451 0000304A 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 33452 0000304D 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 33453                                  spcinumb1:
 33454 0000304F 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 33455                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33456                                  	; ds = cs
 33457 00003050 3B06[5D1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 33458                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 33459                                  spcinumb2:
 33460 00003054 C3                      	retn
 33461                                  
 33462                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33463                                  ;
 33464                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 33465                                  ;
 33466                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 33467                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 33468                                  ;
 33469                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33470                                  
 33471                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33472                                  ;
 33473                                  ;PrepareMark:
 33474                                  ;	push	ds
 33475                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 33476                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33477                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33478                                  ;	pop	ds
 33479                                  ;
 33480                                  ;	inc	ax
 33481                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33482                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33483                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33484                                  ;	retn
 33485                                  
 33486                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33487                                  ;
 33488                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 33489                                  ;
 33490                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 33491                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 33492                                  ;		 the device.
 33493                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 33494                                  ;
 33495                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 33496                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 33497                                  ;	UMB.
 33498                                  ;
 33499                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 33500                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 33501                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 33502                                  ;
 33503                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33504                                  
 33505                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33506                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 33507                                  
 33508                                  GetUMBForDev:
 33509                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33510                                  	; ds = cs
 33511 00003055 BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 33512 00003058 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33513 0000305B CD21                    	int	21h
 33514                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 33515                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 33516                                  
 33517 0000305D 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 33518                                  	;jz	short gufd_err
 33519                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33520 0000305F 742E                    	jz	short gufd_error ; bx = 0
 33521                                  
 33522 00003061 4B                      	dec	bx
 33523                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33524                                  	; ds = cs
 33525 00003062 391E[5D1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 33526                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 33527 00003066 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 33528                                  
 33529 00003068 43                      	inc	bx
 33530                                  
 33531 00003069 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 33532 0000306C CD21                    	int	21h
 33533 0000306E 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 33534                                  
 33535                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33536                                  	;dec	ax
 33537                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 33538                                  	;
 33539                                  PrepareMark:
 33540 00003070 1E                      	push	ds
 33541 00003071 48                      	dec	ax
 33542 00003072 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33543 00003074 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 33544 0000307A C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 33545 00003080 40                      	inc	ax
 33546 00003081 1F                      	pop	ds
 33547                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33548                                  	; ds = cs
 33549                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 33550                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33551                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33552                                  gufd_x:		; 09/09/2023
 33553 00003082 891E[6F1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 33554 00003086 A3[6D1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33555 00003089 A3[711F]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33556                                  	;
 33557                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33558                                  	; cf=0
 33559                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 33560 0000308C C3                      	retn
 33561                                  
 33562                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33563                                  %if 1
 33564                                  gufd_err:
 33565 0000308D 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx ; 0
 33566                                  gufd_error:
 33567 0000308F 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33568 00003091 F9                      	stc	; cf=1
 33569 00003092 EBEE                    	jmp	short gufd_x	
 33570                                  %endif
 33571                                  
 33572                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33573                                  %if 0
 33574                                  gufd_err:
 33575                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 33576                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33577                                  	; ds = cs
 33578                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 33579                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 33580                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 33581                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 33582                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 33583                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 33584                                  	stc
 33585                                  	retn
 33586                                  %endif

 33588                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33589                                  ;
 33590                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 33591                                  ;
 33592                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 33593                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 33594                                  ;
 33595                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 33596                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 33597                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 33598                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 33599                                  ;
 33600                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 33601                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 33602                                  ;
 33603                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33604                                  
 33605                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33606                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 33607                                  
 33608                                  DevSetMark:
 33609 00003094 06                      	push	es
 33610                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33611                                  	;push	di
 33612 00003095 1E                      	push	ds
 33613 00003096 56                      	push	si
 33614 00003097 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33615 00003099 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 33616 0000309F 40                      	inc	ax
 33617 000030A0 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 33618                                  
 33619                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 33620                                  
 33621 000030A4 50                      	push	ax			; save load address
 33622                                  	
 33623                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33624                                  	; ds = cs
 33625                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 33626 000030A5 C536[7C03]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 33627                                  
 33628 000030A9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33629 000030AB FC                      	cld
 33630                                  dsm_again:
 33631 000030AC AC                      	lodsb
 33632 000030AD 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 33633 000030AF 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 33634 000030B1 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33635 000030B3 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33636                                  isit_slash:
 33637 000030B5 3C5C                    	cmp	al,'\'
 33638 000030B7 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 33639 000030B9 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33640 000030BB EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 33641                                  isit_null:
 33642 000030BD 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33643 000030BF 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 33644 000030C1 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 33645                                  
 33646 000030C3 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 33647 000030C6 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 33648                                  dsm_next_char:
 33649 000030C9 AC                      	lodsb
 33650 000030CA 08C0                    	or	al,al
 33651 000030CC 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 33652 000030CE 3C2E                    	cmp	al,'.'
 33653 000030D0 7403                    	je	short blankout
 33654 000030D2 AA                      	stosb
 33655 000030D3 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 33656                                  blankout:
 33657 000030D5 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 33658 000030D7 B020                    	mov	al,' '
 33659 000030D9 F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 33660                                  dsm_exit:
 33661 000030DB 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load address
 33662 000030DC 5E                      	pop	si
 33663 000030DD 1F                      	pop	ds
 33664                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33665                                  	;pop	di
 33666 000030DE 07                      	pop	es
 33667 000030DF C3                      	retn
 33668                                  
 33669                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33670                                  ;
 33671                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 33672                                  ;
 33673                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 33674                                  ;
 33675                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 33676                                  ;
 33677                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 33678                                  ;	in DevSize
 33679                                  ;
 33680                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33681                                  
 33682                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33683                                  SizeDevice:
 33684                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33685                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 33686 000030E0 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 33687 000030E1 06                      	push	es
 33688 000030E2 1F                      	pop	ds
 33689 000030E3 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 33690 000030E5 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 33691 000030E8 CD21                    	int	21h
 33692 000030EA 7237                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 33693                                  
 33694 000030EC 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 33695 000030EE B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 33696 000030F1 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 33697 000030F3 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 33698 000030F5 CD21                    	int	21h

 34121                                  ;
 34122                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 34123                                  ;
 34124                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 34125                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 34126                                  ;
 34127                                  ;	Returns in AX the number of paras equivalent to the
 34128                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 34129                                  ;
 34130                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 34131                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 34132                                  ;
 34133                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34134                                  
 34135                                  ; 13/05/2019
 34136                                  
 34137                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34138                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 34139                                  
 34140                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34141                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 34142                                  GetHexNum:
 34143 00003218 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 34144 0000321A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 34145                                  ghn_next:
 34146 0000321C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 34147 0000321F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 34148 00003222 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 34149 00003224 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 34150 00003227 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 34151 00003229 50                      	push	ax
 34152 0000322A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 34153 0000322C E8D80F                  	call	delim
 34154 0000322F 58                      	pop	ax
 34155                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34156 00003230 B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 34157 00003233 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 34158 00003235 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 34159                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 34160                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34161 00003238 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 34162                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34163                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34164                                  ghn_shift1:
 34165 0000323A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 34166 0000323C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 34167 0000323E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 34168 00003240 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 34169 00003242 46                      	inc	si
 34170 00003243 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 34171                                  ghn_into_paras:
 34172 00003245 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 34173 00003248 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 34174 0000324B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 34175 0000324F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 34176                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34177                                  	;mov	cx,4
 34178                                  ghn_shift2:
 34179 00003251 F8                      	clc
 34180 00003252 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 34181 00003254 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 34182 00003256 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 34183 00003258 F8                      	clc
 34184 00003259 C3                      	retn
 34185                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34186                                  ghn_err:
 34187                                  gnib_err:
 34188 0000325A F9                      	stc
 34189                                  ghn_ret:
 34190                                  gnib_ret:
 34191 0000325B C3                      	retn

 34193                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34194                                  ;
 34195                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 34196                                  ;
 34197                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 34198                                  ;
 34199                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 34200                                  ;
 34201                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 34202                                  ;
 34203                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34204                                  
 34205                                  GetNibble:
 34206 0000325C 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 34207                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34208                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34209 0000325F 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34210 00003261 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 34211 00003264 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 34212 00003266 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 34213 00003269 C3                      	retn
 34214                                  is_it_hex:
 34215 0000326A 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 34216                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 34217                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34218 0000326D 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 34219 0000326F 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 34220 00003272 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 34221 00003274 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 34222 00003277 C3                      	retn
 34223                                  
 34224                                  	; 11/12/2022
 34225                                  ;gnib_err:
 34226                                  ;	stc
 34227                                  ;gnib_ret:
 34228                                  ;	retn
 34229                                  
 34230                                  ;============================================================================
 34231                                  
 34232                                  ; 12/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34233                                  
 34234                                  ; umb.inc (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 34235                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 34236                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data
 34237                                  
 34238                                  XMM_REQUEST_UMB	equ 10h
 34239                                  XMM_RELEASE_UMB	equ 11h
 34240                                  
 34241                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34242                                  
 34243                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34244                                  ;
 34245                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 34246                                  ;
 34247                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 34248                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 34249                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 34250                                  ;			; DS = data
 34251                                  ;
 34252                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 34253                                  ;
 34254                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 34255                                  ;
 34256                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34257                                  
 34258                                  umb_insert:
 34259 00003278 1E                      	push	ds
 34260                                  
 34261                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34262                                  	; ds = cs
 34263                                  
 34264                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34265 00003279 8E1E[8A1F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 34266                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 34267 0000327D 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 34268 00003281 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 34269 00003283 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 34270                                  ui_next:
 34271 00003285 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 34272                                  					;    new block
 34273 00003287 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 34274                                  					; Q: is current block the
 34275                                  					;    last
 34276 00003289 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 34277 0000328F 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 34278                                  					; N: get next block
 34279 00003291 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 34280                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 34281 00003293 E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34282 00003296 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 34283                                  
 34284                                  ui_insert:
 34285 00003298 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 34286 0000329A 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 34287                                  
 34288 0000329B 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 34289 0000329D F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 34290                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 34291 0000329F C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34292                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 34293 000032A4 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34294                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 34295 000032AA 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 34296                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 34297 000032AE C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34298                                  
 34299                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34300                                  
 34301 000032B4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34302 000032B6 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 34303 000032BC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 34304                                  					; mark as free
 34305 000032C3 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 34306                                  					; start & end of new block
 34307 000032C6 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 34308                                  
 34309                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 34310                                  	
 34311 000032CB 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 34312 000032CD 43                      	inc	bx
 34313 000032CE 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 34314 000032D0 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 34315                                  
 34316                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 34317                                  					; this block
 34318 000032D1 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 34319                                  	
 34320 000032D3 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34321 000032D9 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34322 000032E0 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34323 000032E4 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 34324                                  
 34325 000032EB EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 34326                                  
 34327                                  ui_append:
 34328                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 34329 000032ED 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 34330 000032F2 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 34331                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 34332                                  					; block for the next arena.
 34333                                  	; 13/05/2019
 34334 000032F8 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34335                                  
 34336 000032FE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 34337 00003300 40                      	inc	ax
 34338 00003301 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 34339                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 34340 00003303 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 34341                                  
 34342 00003305 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 34343                                  
 34344 00003307 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 34345 0000330D 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 34346 00003314 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 34347 00003318 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 34348                                  
 34349                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 34350 0000331F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 34351 00003321 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 34352 00003327 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 34353                                  					; mark as free
 34354 0000332E 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 34355 0000332F 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 34356                                  ui_done:
 34357                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 34358 00003334 1F                      	pop	ds
 34359                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 34360                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34361                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 34362 00003335 C3                      	retn
 34363                                  
 34364                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34365                                  ;
 34366                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 34367                                  ;
 34368                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 34369                                  ;
 34370                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34371                                  
 34372                                  AllocUMB:
 34373                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34374                                  	; ds = cs
 34375 00003336 E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB
 34376 00003339 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 34377                                  au_next:
 34378 0000333B E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 34379 0000333E 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 34380 00003340 E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 34381 00003343 EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 34382                                  au_coalesce:
 34383                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34384                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 34385                                  ;au_exit:
 34386                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 34387                                  ;	; ds = cs
 34388                                  ;	retn
 34389                                  
 34390                                  	; 09/09/2023
 34391                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 34392                                  
 34393                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 34394                                  
 34395                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34396                                  
 34397                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34398                                  ;
 34399                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 34400                                  ;
 34401                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 34402                                  ;	if it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 34403                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 34404                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 34405                                  ;
 34406                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 34407                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 34408                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 34409                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 34410                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 34411                                  ;
 34412                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34413                                  
 34414                                  umb_coalesce:
 34415                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34416                                  	; ds = cs
 34417 00003345 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 34418                                  
 34419 00003346 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 34420                                  
 34421                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 34422                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34423 00003348 8E06[8A1F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 34424 0000334C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 34425                                  uc_nextfree:
 34426 00003351 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 34427 00003353 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 34428                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 34429 00003355 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 34430 0000335A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 34431                                  					; N: get next arena
 34432 0000335C E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34433 0000335F 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34434 00003361 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 34435                                  uc_again:
 34436 00003363 E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 34437 00003366 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 34438                                  uc_check:
 34439 00003368 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 34440 0000336D 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 34441                                  					; Y: coalesce
 34442 0000336F 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 34443 00003374 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 34444                                  	;add	[3],cx
 34445 00003375 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 34446 00003379 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 34447 0000337C 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 34448 0000337E EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 34449                                  
 34450                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34451                                  ;uc_done:
 34452                                  	;retn

 34459                                  
 34460                                  InitAllocUMB:
 34461                                  	; 31/12/2022
 34462                                  	; ds = cs
 34463 00003380 E828D7                  	call	IsXMSLoaded
