 36631 00003B66 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 36632 00003B67 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 36633 00003B6B 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 36634                                  
 36635                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 36636                                  
 36637 00003B6D B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 36638 00003B6F 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 36639 00003B71 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 36640 00003B74 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 36641 00003B78 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 36642 00003B7A CD10                            int     10h             ;
 36643                                  
 36644 00003B7C BA[4D4C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 36645 00003B7F E84F09                          call    print           ;
 36646 00003B82 E82903                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 36647 00003B85 BA[1E4A]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 36648 00003B88 E84609                          call    print           ;
 36649 00003B8B FF36[FF46]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 36650 00003B8F 800E[FF46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 36651 00003B94 E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 36652 00003B97 8F06[FF46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 36653                                  
 36654                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 36655                                  
 36656                                  menu_autoselect:
 36657 00003B9B 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 36658 00003B9E 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 36659 00003BA0 E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 36660                                  menu_abort:
 36661 00003BA3 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 36662 00003BA5 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 36663                                  
 36664                                  normal_boot:
 36665 00003BA8 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 36666 00003BAB 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 36667 00003BAD 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 36668 00003BB1 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36669 00003BB3 E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 36670                                  
 36671                                  not_topmenu:
 36672 00003BB6 80BF[0A47]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 36673 00003BBB 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 36674 00003BBD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 36675 00003BBF 8BBF[1447]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36676 00003BC3 E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 36677 00003BC6 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36678 00003BC8 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 36679 00003BCA E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 36680                                  
 36681                                  not_submenu:
 36682 00003BCD 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 36683 00003BCF 8B9F[1447]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 36684                                  
 36685                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 36686                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 36687                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 36688                                  
 36689                                  no_selection:
 36690 00003BD3 891E[0647]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 36691 00003BD7 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 36692 00003BDB 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36693 00003BDD 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36694 00003BDE 8E1E[B614]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 36695 00003BE2 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36696                                  
 36697                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 36698                                  ;
 36699                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 36700                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 36701                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 36702                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 36703                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 36704                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 36705                                  ;
 36706                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 36707                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 36708                                  
 36709                                  copyblock_loop:
 36710 00003BE4 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 36711 00003BE5 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 36712 00003BE8 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 36713 00003BE9 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36714                                  
 36715                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 36716                                  
 36717                                  copyblock_begin:
 36718                                  
 36719                                  ; 10/09/2023
 36720                                  %if 0
 36721                                          push    ax              ;
 36722                                          push    cx              ;
 36723                                          push    si              ;
 36724                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 36725                                          mov     di,szCommon
 36726                                          push    ds              ;
 36727                                          push    cs              ;
 36728                                          pop     ds              ;
 36729                                          call    comp_names      ;
 36730                                          pop     ds              ;
 36731                                          pop     di              ;
 36732                                          pop     si              ;
 36733                                          pop     cx              ;
 36734                                          pop     ax              ;
 36735                                          je	short copyblock_check
 36736                                  %endif
 36737                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36738 00003BEB 57                      	push	di
 36739 00003BEC BF[4947]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 36740 00003BEF E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 36741 00003BF2 5F                      	pop	di
 36742 00003BF3 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 36743                                  
 36744 00003BF5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 36745 00003BF7 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 36746 00003BF9 57                              push    di              ;
 36747 00003BFA 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 36748 00003BFC 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36749 00003BFD 06                              push    es              ;
 36750 00003BFE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36751 00003BFF E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 36752 00003C02 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36753 00003C03 5F                              pop     di              ;
 36754                                  copyblock_check:
 36755 00003C04 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36756 00003C06 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 36757 00003C08 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 36758 00003C0B EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 36759                                  
 36760                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 36761 00003C0D E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 36762 00003C10 E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 36763 00003C13 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 36764 00003C15 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36765 00003C17 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 36766 00003C19 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 36767 00003C1B EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 36768                                  ;
 36769                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 36770                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 36771                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 36772                                  ;
 36773                                  move_config:
 36774 00003C1D 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 36775 00003C1F 51                              push    cx              ;
 36776                                  ;
 36777                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 36778                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 36779                                  ;
 36780                                   	;mov	cx,7
 36781 00003C20 B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 36782 00003C23 BE[3C47]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 36783 00003C26 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 36784                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 36785                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 36786                                  copy_boot: 
 36787                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 36788 00003C27 2E                              cs
 36789 00003C28 AC                      	lodsb
 36790 00003C29 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 36791 00003C2B 47                              inc     di              ;
 36792 00003C2C E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 36793                                  
 36794 00003C2E 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 36795                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 36796                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36797 00003C2F B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 36798 00003C31 2E8B36[0647]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 36799 00003C36 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 36800 00003C38 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 36801 00003C3A 0E                              push    cs              ;
 36802 00003C3B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36803 00003C3C BE[4947]                        mov     si,szCommon
 36804 00003C3F 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 36805 00003C42 E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 36806 00003C45 7406                            je	short l2	;
 36807 00003C47 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 36808 00003C49 46                              inc     si              ;
 36809 00003C4A 47                              inc     di              ;
 36810 00003C4B E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 36811 00003C4D C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 36812 00003C50 07                              pop     es              ;
 36813                                  
 36814                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 36815                                  
 36816 00003C51 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 36817 00003C53 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 36818 00003C58 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 36819 00003C5A 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 36820                                  
 36821 00003C5B 51                              push    cx              ;
 36822 00003C5C F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 36823 00003C5E 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36824 00003C5F 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 36825 00003C61 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 36826                                  
 36827                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 36828                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 36829                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 36830                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 36831                                  ;   is empty.
 36832                                  
 36833 00003C62 06                              push    es              ;
 36834 00003C63 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36835 00003C65 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 36836 00003C66 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	; empty the environment block
 36837 00003C6C E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36838 00003C6F 07                              pop     es
 36839                                  
 36840                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 36841                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 36842                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 36843                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 36844                                  
 36845                                  menu_done:
 36846 00003C70 803E[FB46]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 36847 00003C75 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 36848 00003C77 06                              push    es              ;
 36849 00003C78 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 36850 00003C7B 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 36851 00003C7D A1[0147]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 36852 00003C80 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 36853 00003C84 A0[0047]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 36854 00003C87 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 36855 00003C8B 07                              pop     es              ;
 36856                                  menu_exit:
 36857 00003C8C 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 36858 00003C90 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 36859                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*)
 36860                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 36861                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 36862                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 36863 00003C94 C3                      	retn
 36864                                  
 36865                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 36866                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 36867                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 36868                                  
 36869                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36870                                  ;
 36871                                  ;   copy_envvar: copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 36872                                  ;
 36873                                  ;   INPUT
 36874                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 36875                                  ;
 36876                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36877                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 36878                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 36879                                  ;
 36880                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36881                                  ;       None
 36882                                  ;
 36883                                  ;   NOTES
 36884                                  ;       None
 36885                                  ;
 36886                                  ;   HISTORY
 36887                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36888                                  ;
 36889                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36890                                  
 36891                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36892                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 36893                                  
 36894                                  copy_envvar:
 36895 00003C95 51                              push    cx              ;
 36896 00003C96 56                              push    si              ;
 36897 00003C97 1E                              push    ds              ;
 36898 00003C98 06                              push    es              ;
 36899 00003C99 06                              push    es              ;
 36900 00003C9A 8E06[B614]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 36901 00003C9E 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 36902                                  
 36903                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 36904                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 36905                                  ;   config.sys line)
 36906                                  ;
 36907                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 36908                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 36909                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 36910                                  
 36911 00003C9F 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 36912                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 36913 00003CA1 AC                              lodsb                   ;
 36914 00003CA2 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 36915                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36916 00003CA4 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 36917 00003CA6 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 36918                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36919 00003CA8 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 36920 00003CAA 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 36921                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 36922 00003CAC 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 36923 00003CAE 41                              inc     cx              ;
 36924 00003CAF 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 36925 00003CB1 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 36926 00003CB3 B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 36927 00003CB5 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 36928 00003CB7 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 36929 00003CB9 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 36930 00003CBA 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 36931                                  copy_varsrch:
 36932 00003CBC 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 36933 00003CBF 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 36934 00003CC1 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 36935 00003CC3 51                              push    cx              ;
 36936 00003CC4 56                              push    si              ;
 36937 00003CC5 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 36938 00003CC7 5E                              pop     si              ;
 36939 00003CC8 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36940 00003CC9 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 36941 00003CCB 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 36942 00003CCF 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 36943                                  
 36944                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 36945                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 36946                                  
 36947 00003CD1 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36948 00003CD4 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 36949 00003CD6 56                              push    si              ;
 36950 00003CD7 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 36951 00003CD9 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 36952 00003CDB 2E8B0E[B414]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 36953 00003CE0 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 36954                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 36955                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 36956                                  
 36957 00003CE2 F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 36958 00003CE3 26                      	es	; 26h
 36959 00003CE4 A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 36960                                  
 36961 00003CE5 5E                      	pop     si
 36962                                  copy_envprep:
 36963 00003CE6 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 36964 00003CE9 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 36965 00003CEB 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 36966 00003CEE 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 36967                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 36968                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36969                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 36970 00003CF0 AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 36971 00003CF1 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36972 00003CF3 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36973 00003CF5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36974 00003CF7 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 36975 00003CF9 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 36976 00003CFA EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36977                                  
 36978                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 36979 00003CFC 51                              push    cx              ;
 36980 00003CFD B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 36981 00003D00 F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 36982 00003D02 59                              pop     cx              ;
 36983 00003D03 EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 36984                                  
 36985                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36986                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 36987                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 36988                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 36989                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36990                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 36991                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 36992                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 36993                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 36994                                  
 36995                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 36996 00003D05 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 36997 00003D07 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 36998                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 36999 00003D08 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 37000 00003D0B 2E893E[B414]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37001                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 37002 00003D10 F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 37003                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 37004 00003D11 F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 37005 00003D12 07                              pop     es              ;
 37006 00003D13 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37007 00003D14 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37008 00003D15 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37009                                  
 37010                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37011 00003D16 C3                              retn
 37012                                  
 37013                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37014                                  ;
 37015                                  ;   copy_block: copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 37016                                  ;
 37017                                  ;   INPUT
 37018                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37019                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37020                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 37021                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 37022                                  ;
 37023                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37024                                  ;       Same as above
 37025                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 37026                                  ;
 37027                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37028                                  ;       All
 37029                                  ;
 37030                                  ;   NOTES
 37031                                  ;       None
 37032                                  ;
 37033                                  ;   HISTORY
 37034                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37035                                  ;
 37036                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37037                                  
 37038                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37039                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 37040                                  
 37041                                  copy_block:
 37042 00003D17 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 37043 00003D1A 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 37044 00003D1C 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37045 00003D1E 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 37046 00003D20 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 37047                                  
 37048 00003D22 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 37049 00003D24 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 37050 00003D26 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 37051                                  
 37052                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 37053                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 37054                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 37055                                  
 37056 00003D28 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 37057 00003D2D 57                              push    di              ;
 37058                                  
 37059 00003D2E BF[4447]                        mov     di,szMenu
 37060 00003D31 E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 37061 00003D34 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37062                                  
 37063 00003D36 BF[4947]                        mov     di,szCommon
 37064 00003D39 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 37065 00003D3C 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37066                                  
 37067 00003D3E 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 37068 00003D40 E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 37069 00003D43 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 37070                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37071                                  	;pop    di              ;
 37072 00003D45 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 37073 00003D47 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 37074 00003D48 51                              push    cx              ;
 37075 00003D49 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 37076 00003D4B 56                              push    si              ;
 37077 00003D4C 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 37078 00003D4D 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 37079 00003D4F E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 37080 00003D52 E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 37081 00003D55 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37082 00003D56 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37083 00003D57 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 37084 00003D59 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37085                                  
 37086                                  copy_error:
 37087                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37088 00003D5B F8                      	clc
 37089                                  copy_skip:
 37090 00003D5C 5F                              pop     di
 37091                                  ;copy_error:
 37092                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 37093                                  	;clc                    ;
 37094 00003D5D E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 37095 00003D60 EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37096                                  
 37097                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 37098                                  
 37099                                  copy_line:
 37100 00003D62 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37101 00003D64 47                              inc     di              ;
 37102 00003D65 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 37103 00003D67 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 37104 00003D69 2E803E[B914]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 37105 00003D6F 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 37106 00003D71 E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 37107 00003D74 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 37108 00003D76 47                              inc     di              ;
 37109 00003D77 47                              inc     di              ;
 37110 00003D78 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 37111                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 37112 00003D7A E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 37113 00003D7D 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 37114 00003D7F 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37115 00003D81 47                              inc     di              ;
 37116                                  copy_next:
 37117 00003D82 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 37118 00003D84 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 37119                                  
 37120                                  copy_nextline:
 37121 00003D86 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37122 00003D89 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 37123                                  
 37124                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37125                                  ;copy_done:
 37126                                          ;retn
 37127                                  
 37128                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37129                                  ;
 37130                                  ;   get_linenum: return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 37131                                  ;
 37132                                  ;   INPUT
 37133                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 37134                                  ;
 37135                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37136                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 37137                                  ;
 37138                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37139                                  ;       DX
 37140                                  ;
 37141                                  ;   NOTES
 37142                                  ;       None
 37143                                  ;
 37144                                  ;   HISTORY
 37145                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37146                                  ;
 37147                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37148                                  
 37149                                  get_linenum:
 37150 00003D8B 50                              push    ax              ;
 37151 00003D8C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 37152 00003D8E 51                              push    cx              ;
 37153 00003D8F 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 37154 00003D91 56                              push    si              ;
 37155 00003D92 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37156 00003D97 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37157                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37158 00003D99 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37159 00003D9C 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37160 00003D9E 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37161 00003D9F 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37162 00003DA1 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37163                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37164 00003DA3 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37165 00003DA4 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37166 00003DA5 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37167 00003DA6 C3                              retn
 37168                                  
 37169                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37170                                  ;
 37171                                  ;   srch_block: searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37172                                  ;
 37173                                  ;   INPUT
 37174                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37175                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37176                                  ;
 37177                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37178                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37179                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37180                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37181                                  ;
 37182                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37183                                  ;       None
 37184                                  ;
 37185                                  ;   NOTES
 37186                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37187                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37188                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37189                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37190                                  ;
 37191                                  ;   HISTORY
 37192                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37193                                  ;
 37194                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37195                                  
 37196                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37197 00003DA7 50                              push    ax              ;
 37198 00003DA8 51                              push    cx              ;
 37199 00003DA9 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37200 00003DAE 56                              push    si              ;
 37201 00003DAF 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37202 00003DB1 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37203 00003DB2 06                              push    es              ;
 37204 00003DB3 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37205 00003DB4 E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37206 00003DB7 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37207 00003DB9 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37208 00003DBB 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37209 00003DBC 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37210 00003DBD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37211 00003DBE 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37212                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 37213 00003DBF C3                              retn			;
 37214                                  
 37215                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37216                                  ;
 37217                                  ;   find_block: searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 37218                                  ;
 37219                                  ;   INPUT
 37220                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 37221                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 37222                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 37223                                  ;
 37224                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37225                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 37226                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37227                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37228                                  ;
 37229                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37230                                  ;       AX
 37231                                  ;
 37232                                  ;   NOTES
 37233                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 37234                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 37235                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 37236                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 37237                                  ;
 37238                                  ;   HISTORY
 37239                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37240                                  ;
 37241                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37242                                  
 37243                                  find_block:
 37244 00003DC0 E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 37245 00003DC3 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 37246 00003DC5 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 37247 00003DC7 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 37248 00003DC9 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 37249 00003DCB 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 37250 00003DCD 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 37251 00003DCF 2E800E[B914]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37252 00003DD5 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 37253                                  check_line:
 37254 00003DD7 2E800E[B914]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 37255 00003DDD E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 37256 00003DE0 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 37257                                  next_line:
 37258 00003DE2 E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 37259 00003DE5 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 37260                                  ;find_exit:
 37261                                  ;	retn
 37262                                  
 37263                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37264                                  ;
 37265                                  ;   comp_names: compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 37266                                  ;
 37267                                  ;   INPUT
 37268                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 37269                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37270                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37271                                  ;
 37272                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37273                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 37274                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 37275                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37276                                  ;
 37277                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37278                                  ;       AX
 37279                                  ;
 37280                                  ;   NOTES
 37281                                  ;       None
 37282                                  ;
 37283                                  ;   HISTORY
 37284                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37285                                  ;
 37286                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37287                                  
 37288                                  comp_names:
 37289 00003DE7 57                              push    di              ;
 37290                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 37291 00003DE8 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 37292 00003DEB 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 37293 00003DED E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 37294 00003DF0 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 37295 00003DF2 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 37296 00003DF4 47                              inc     di              ;
 37297 00003DF5 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 37298                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 37299 00003DF8 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 37300 00003DFA 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 37301 00003DFC F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 37302                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 37303 00003DFD 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37304 00003DFE C3                              retn			;
 37305                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 37306 00003DFF 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 37307 00003E01 E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 37308 00003E04 86C4                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 37309 00003E06 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 37310                                  
 37311                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37312                                  
 37313                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37314                                  comp_names_x:
 37315                                  	;
 37316                                  comp_names_safe:
 37317 00003E08 50                              push    ax
 37318 00003E09 51                              push    cx
 37319 00003E0A 56                              push	si
 37320 00003E0B 1E                              push    ds
 37321 00003E0C 0E                              push    cs
 37322 00003E0D 1F                              pop     ds
 37323 00003E0E E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 37324 00003E11 1F                              pop     ds
 37325 00003E12 5E                      	pop	si
 37326 00003E13 59                              pop     cx
 37327 00003E14 58                              pop     ax
 37328 00003E15 C3                              retn
 37329                                  
 37330                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37331                                  ;
 37332                                  ;   print_item: display menu item #BL
 37333                                  ;
 37334                                  ;   INPUT
 37335                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 37336                                  ;
 37337                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37338                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 37339                                  ;
 37340                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37341                                  ;       None
 37342                                  ;
 37343                                  ;   NOTES
 37344                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 37345                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 37346                                  ;
 37347                                  ;   HISTORY
 37348                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37349                                  ;
 37350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37351                                  
 37352                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37353                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 37354                                  
 37355                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 37356 00003E16 50                              push    ax              ;
 37357 00003E17 53                              push    bx              ;
 37358 00003E18 51                              push    cx              ;
 37359 00003E19 52                              push    dx              ;
 37360 00003E1A 56                              push    si              ;
 37361 00003E1B B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37362 00003E1D 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 37363 00003E21 CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 37364 00003E23 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 37365 00003E24 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37366 00003E26 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37367 00003E28 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 37368 00003E2B B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 37369 00003E2D CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 37370 00003E2F 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37371 00003E31 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 37372 00003E33 8A26[FA46]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 37373 00003E37 3A1E[0447]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 37374 00003E3B 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37375 00003E3D 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 37376 00003E40 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 37377 00003E42 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 37378 00003E44 D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 37379 00003E46 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 37380 00003E48 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 37381 00003E4A 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37382                                  print_other:                    ;
 37383 00003E4D B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 37384 00003E4F 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37385 00003E51 8BBF[2847]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 37386 00003E55 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 37387 00003E57 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 37388 00003E5B B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 37389 00003E5D B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 37390 00003E60 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37391 00003E62 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37392 00003E64 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37393 00003E66 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37394                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 37395 00003E68 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 37396 00003E6B CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 37397 00003E6D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37398 00003E6F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37399 00003E71 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37400                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 37401 00003E73 B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 37402 00003E76 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 37403 00003E78 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37404 00003E7A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37405 00003E7C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37406 00003E7E 06                              push    es              ;
 37407                                  print_loop:                     ;
 37408 00003E7F 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 37409 00003E82 47                              inc     di              ;
 37410 00003E83 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 37411 00003E85 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 37412 00003E87 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 37413                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 37414 00003E89 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 37415 00003E8B 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 37416 00003E8D 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 37417 00003E8F 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 37418 00003E91 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 37419 00003E93 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37420 00003E95 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 37421 00003E97 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 37422 00003E9A 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 37423 00003E9C B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37424 00003E9E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37425 00003EA0 EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 37426                                  print_done:                     ;
 37427 00003EA2 07                              pop     es              ;
 37428 00003EA3 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37429 00003EA4 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 37430 00003EA6 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 37431 00003EA8 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37432 00003EA9 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37433 00003EAA 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37434 00003EAB 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37435 00003EAC 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37436 00003EAD C3                              retn			;
 37437                                  
 37438                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37439                                  ;
 37440                                  ;   select_item: wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 37441                                  ;
 37442                                  ;   INPUT
 37443                                  ;       None
 37444                                  ;
 37445                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37446                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 37447                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 37448                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 37449                                  ;
 37450                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37451                                  ;       None
 37452                                  ;
 37453                                  ;   NOTES
 37454                                  ;       None
 37455                                  ;
 37456                                  ;   HISTORY
 37457                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37458                                  ;
 37459                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37460                                  
 37461                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 37462 00003EAE 8A1E[0447]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 37463 00003EB2 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37464 00003EB4 E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 37465 00003EB7 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 37466 00003EBA 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37467 00003EBF 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 37468 00003EC1 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 37469 00003EC3 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37470 00003EC5 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 37471                                  check_time:
 37472 00003EC7 A0[0847]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 37473 00003ECA 2A06[0947]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 37474 00003ECE 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 37475 00003ED0 800E[0347]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; disable all further prompting
 37476 00003ED5 C606[0947]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 37477 00003EDA E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 37478                                  show_time:
 37479 00003EDD 53                              push    bx              ;
 37480 00003EDE 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 37481 00003EE0 8A3E[FB46]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37482 00003EE4 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 37483 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37484 00003EE8 52                              push    dx              ;
 37485 00003EE9 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 37486 00003EEC B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 37487 00003EEE CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37488 00003EF0 BA[C04C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 37489 00003EF3 E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 37490 00003EF6 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 37491 00003EF8 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 37492 00003EF9 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 37493 00003EFB F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 37494 00003EFD 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 37495 00003EFF 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37496 00003F01 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37497 00003F03 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 37498 00003F05 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 37499 00003F07 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 37500 00003F09 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 37501 00003F0B CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 37502 00003F0D 5A                              pop     dx
 37503 00003F0E B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 37504 00003F10 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37505 00003F12 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37506                                  input_key:
 37507 00003F13 B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 37508 00003F15 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 37509 00003F17 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 37510 00003F19 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 37511 00003F1B 803E[0847]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 37512 00003F20 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 37513 00003F22 B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 37514 00003F24 CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 37515 00003F26 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 37516 00003F28 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 37517 00003F2A 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 37518 00003F2C 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 37519 00003F2E B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 37520                                  got_time:
 37521 00003F30 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 37522 00003F32 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 37523 00003F34 0036[0947]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 37524 00003F38 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 37525                                  got_key:
 37526 00003F3A 50                              push    ax              ;
 37527 00003F3B B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 37528 00003F3E 8706[0847]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 37529 00003F42 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 37530 00003F44 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 37531 00003F46 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 37532 00003F47 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 37533 00003F4A 8B1E[FA46]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 37534 00003F4E B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 37535 00003F51 CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 37536 00003F53 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 37537                                  
 37538                                  timeout_disabled:
 37539 00003F54 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37540 00003F55 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 37541 00003F57 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 37542 00003F59 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 37543 00003F5B 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 37544                                  
 37545 00003F5D 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 37546 00003F5F 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 37547 00003F61 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 37548 00003F64 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 37549 00003F66 FE0E[0447]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37550 00003F6A E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37551 00003F6D FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 37552 00003F6F EB12                            jmp     short print1
 37553                                  not_up:
 37554 00003F71 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 37555 00003F73 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 37556 00003F75 3A1E[0547]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 37557 00003F79 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 37558 00003F7B FE06[0447]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 37559 00003F7F E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 37560 00003F82 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 37561                                  print1: 
 37562 00003F83 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 37563                                  print2: 
 37564 00003F85 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 37565 00003F88 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 37566                                  to_input_key:
 37567 00003F8B EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 37568                                  not_down:
 37569 00003F8D F606[FF46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37570 00003F92 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 37571 00003F94 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37572 00003F96 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no

 37574 00003F9D E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 37575 00003FA0 E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 37576                                  not_f8:
 37577 00003FA3 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 37578 00003FA5 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 37579                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37580                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 37581                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)

 37585 00003FB1 EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...

 37601 00003FCF 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection

 37606 00003FD5 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 37607 00003FD7 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 37608                                  
 37609                                  	; fall into disp_input

 37615                                  ;   disp_input: display a single character + cr/lf
 37616                                  ;
 37617                                  ;   INPUT

 37619                                  ;
 37620                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37621                                  ;       None
 37622                                  ;

 37625                                  ;
 37626                                  ;   NOTES
 37627                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 37628                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 37629                                  ;

 37631                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar

 37641 00003FDA B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 37642 00003FDC 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 37643 00003FDE 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 37644                                  disp_ok:

 37646                                  disp_input_ok:

 37648 00003FE4 CD21                    	int	21h

 37688 00003FFE 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #

 37706                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 37707                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 37708                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 37709                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 37710
