 37728                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37729                                  ;
 37730                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 37731                                  ;
 37732                                  ;   INPUT
 37733                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37734                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37735                                  ;
 37736                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37737                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 37738                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 37739                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 37740                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37741                                  ;
 37742                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37743                                  ;       AX
 37744                                  ;
 37745                                  ;   NOTES
 37746                                  ;       None
 37747                                  ;
 37748                                  ;   HISTORY
 37749                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37750                                  ;
 37751                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37752                                  
 37753                                  skip_token:
 37754 0000403B E84D00                          call    get_char
 37755 0000403E 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 37756 00004040 E8B401                          call    any_delim
 37757 00004043 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 37758                                  skip_check_eol:
 37759 00004045 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 37760 00004047 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37761 00004049 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37762 0000404B 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 37763 0000404D F8                              clc
 37764                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 37765 0000404E C3                      	retn
 37766                                  skip_token_eol:
 37767 0000404F F9                              stc
 37768                                  skip_token_done:
 37769 00004050 C3                              retn
 37770                                  
 37771                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37772                                  ;
 37773                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 37774                                  ;
 37775                                  ;   INPUT
 37776                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37777                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37778                                  ;
 37779                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37780                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37781                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 37782                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 37783                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37784                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 37785                                  ;
 37786                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37787                                  ;       AX
 37788                                  ;
 37789                                  ;   NOTES
 37790                                  ;       None
 37791                                  ;
 37792                                  ;   HISTORY
 37793                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37794                                  ;
 37795                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37796                                  
 37797                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 37798 00004051 E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 37799 00004054 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 37800 00004057 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 37801 00004059 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 37802 0000405C 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 37803 0000405E EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 37804                                  
 37805                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37806                                  ;
 37807                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 37808                                  ;
 37809                                  ;   INPUT
 37810                                  ;       AL == last character read
 37811                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37812                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37813                                  ;
 37814                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37815                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37816                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 37817                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37818                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37819                                  ;
 37820                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37821                                  ;       AX
 37822                                  ;
 37823                                  ;   NOTES
 37824                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 37825                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 37826                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 37827                                  ;
 37828                                  ;   HISTORY
 37829                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37830                                  ;
 37831                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37832                                  
 37833                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37834                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 37835                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37836                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 37837                                       
 37838                                  	; fall into skip_line
 37839                                  
 37840                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37841                                  ;
 37842                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 37843                                  ;
 37844                                  ;   INPUT
 37845                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37846                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37847                                  ;
 37848                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37849                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 37850                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 37851                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37852                                  ;
 37853                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37854                                  ;       AX
 37855                                  ;
 37856                                  ;   NOTES
 37857                                  ;       None
 37858                                  ;
 37859                                  ;   HISTORY
 37860                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37861                                  ;
 37862                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37863                                  
 37864                                  skip_line:
 37865 00004060 E82800                          call    get_char
 37866 00004063 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 37867                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 37868 00004065 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 37869 00004067 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 37870                                  skip_line_done:
 37871                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37872 00004069 C3                              retn

 37874                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37875                                  ;
 37876                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 37877                                  ;
 37878                                  ;   INPUT
 37879                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37880                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37881                                  ;
 37882                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37883                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 37884                                  ;       BX == binary #
 37885                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 37886                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37887                                  ;
 37888                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37889                                  ;       AX
 37890                                  ;
 37891                                  ;   NOTES
 37892                                  ;       None
 37893                                  ;
 37894                                  ;   HISTORY
 37895                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37896                                  ;
 37897                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37898                                  
 37899                                  ; 13/05/2019
 37900                                  
 37901                                  get_number:
 37902 0000406A 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 37903                                  num_loop:
 37904 0000406C E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 37905 0000406F 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 37906 00004071 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 37907 00004073 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 37908 00004075 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 37909 00004077 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 37910 00004079 50                              push    ax              ;
 37911 0000407A B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 37912 0000407D 52                              push    dx              ;
 37913 0000407E F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 37914 00004080 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 37915 00004081 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 37916 00004083 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37917 00004084 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 37918 00004086 98                              cbw                     ;
 37919 00004087 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 37920 00004089 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 37921                                  
 37922                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37923                                  ;num_done:
 37924                                          ;retn

 37926                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37927                                  ;
 37928                                  ;   get_char: return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 37929                                  ;
 37930                                  ;   INPUT
 37931                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 37932                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 37933                                  ;
 37934                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37935                                  ;       AL == next character
 37936                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 37937                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 37938                                  ;
 37939                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37940                                  ;       AX
 37941                                  ;
 37942                                  ;   NOTES
 37943                                  ;       None
 37944                                  ;
 37945                                  ;   HISTORY
 37946                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37947                                  ;
 37948                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37949                                  
 37950                                  get_char:
 37951 0000408B 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 37952 0000408E 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 37953                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 37954 00004090 26                      	es	
 37955 00004091 AC                      	lodsb
 37956 00004092 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 37957 00004094 C3                              retn			;
 37958                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 37959 00004095 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 37960                                  nearby_ret:
 37961 00004098 C3                              retn
 37962                                  
 37963                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37964                                  ;
 37965                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 37966                                  ;
 37967                                  ;   INPUT
 37968                                  ;       AL == current command code
 37969                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 37970                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 37971                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 37972                                  ;
 37973                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37974                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 37975                                  ;
 37976                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37977                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 37978                                  ;
 37979                                  ;   NOTES
 37980                                  ;       None
 37981                                  ;
 37982                                  ;   HISTORY
 37983                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37984                                  ;
 37985                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37986                                  
 37987                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37988                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 37989                                  
 37990                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37991                                  query_user:
 37992 00004099 F606[0347]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 37993                                  	; 01/01/2023
 37994 0000409E 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 37995 000040A0 E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 37996                                  	; 12/12/2022
 37997                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 37998                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 37999                                  qu_1:
 38000 000040A3 F606[0347]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38001 000040A8 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38002 000040AA 50                              push    ax                      ;
 38003 000040AB A0[B814]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 38004 000040AE F606[0347]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38005 000040B3 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38006 000040B5 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38007                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38008 000040B7 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 38009                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38010                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 38011                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 38012                                  
 38013                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38014 000040B9 58                      	pop	ax
 38015 000040BA C3                      	retn
 38016                                  
 38017                                  query_all:
 38018                                  
 38019                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38020                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38021                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38022                                  
 38023 000040BB 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38024 000040BC BA[124D]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38025 000040BF 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38026 000040C1 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38027                                  
 38028 000040C3 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38029 000040C5 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38030 000040C7 BF[5047]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38031                                  find_match:                             ;
 38032 000040CA 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38033 000040CC 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38034 000040CE 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38035 000040D0 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38036 000040D1 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38037 000040D3 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38038 000040D5 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38039                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38040 000040D8 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38041                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38042 000040DA 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38043 000040DD B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38044 000040DF B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38045                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38046 000040E1 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38047 000040E3 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38048 000040E4 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38049 000040E6 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38050 000040E8 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38051 000040EA B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38052 000040EC 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='

 38054 000040F1 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38055                                  cmd_notset:
 38056 000040F3 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38057                                  line_print:                             ;
 38058                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38059 000040F5 26                              es
 38060 000040F6 AC                      	lodsb
 38061 000040F7 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38062 000040F9 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38063 000040FB B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38064                                  non_null:                               ;
 38065 000040FD 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38066 000040FF 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38067 00004101 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38068                                          ; 10/09/2023

 38070                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38071 00004106 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38072                                  non_space:                              ;
 38073 00004108 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38074 0000410A B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38075 0000410C CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38076 0000410E EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38077                                  
 38078                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38079 00004110 BA[B04C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38080                                  
 38081                                  generic_prompt:
 38082 00004113 E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38083                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38084 00004116 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38085 00004118 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38086 0000411A 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38087 0000411C 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38088 0000411E 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38089 00004121 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no

 38091 00004126 800E[0347]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38092 0000412B EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38093                                  not_func:
 38094 0000412D 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38095 0000412F 3A06[BC4C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38096 00004133 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38097 00004135 3A06[B84C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38098 00004139 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38099 0000413B 803E[B814]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38100 00004140 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38101 00004142 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?

 38104 0000414B A0[B84C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38105                                  legal_char:                             ;

 38108

 38110 00004156 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38111                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38112 00004158 F8                      	clc
 38113                                  do_cmd:
 38114 00004159 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38115                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38116                                  	; cf=0
 38117                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38118 0000415A C3                      	retn
 38119                                  
 38120                                  skip_cmd:

 38182                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38183                                  
 38184                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38185                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38186                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38187                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38188                                  
 38189                                  disable_autoexec:
 38190                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38191                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38192                                  
 38193 00004194 F606[0347]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38194 00004199 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38195 0000419B F606[F946]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38196 000041A0 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38197 000041A2 800E[F946]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38198                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38199 000041A7 810E[0347]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38200 000041AD BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38201                                  dae_1:
 38202                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38203 000041B0 A0[3846]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38204                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38205 000041B3 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38206 000041B5 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38207 000041B7 8A1E[3946]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 38208 000041BB B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 38209 000041BD 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 38210 000041BF 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 38211 000041C2 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 38212 000041C5 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 38213 000041C7 881E[3946]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 38214 000041CB 81C3[3A46]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 38215 000041CF 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 38216                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 38217 000041D0 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 38218 000041D3 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 38219 000041D5 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 38220 000041D6 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 38221 000041D8 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 38222                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 38223 000041DB 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 38224                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 38225                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 38226 000041DE C3                              retn
 38227                                  
 38228                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh

 38366                                  ; 
 38367                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 38368                                  ;
 38369                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38370                                  
 38371                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 38372                                  
 38373                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38374                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 38375                                  mapcase:
 38376 00004243 51                      	push	cx
 38377 00004244 56                      	push	si
 38378 00004245 1E                      	push	ds
 38379                                  
 38380 00004246 06                      	push	es
 38381 00004247 1F                      	pop	ds
 38382                                  
 38383                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38384                                  
 38385                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38386                                  
 38387                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38388 00004248 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 38389                                  ;else
 38390                                  ;	xor	si,si
 38391                                  ;endif
 38392                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38393                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38394                                  	;xor	si, si
 38395                                  
 38396                                  convloop:
 38397 0000424A AC                      	lodsb
 38398 0000424B 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 38399 0000424D 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 38400 0000424F 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 38401 00004251 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 38402 00004253 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 38403 00004255 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 38404                                  noconv:
 38405                                  
 38406                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38407                                  
 38408                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 38409                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 38410                                  
 38411                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 38412                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 38413                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 38414                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 38415                                  ;
 38416 00004258 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 38417 0000425B 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 38418 0000425D 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 38419 0000425F 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 38420                                  check_eol:
 38421 00004261 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 38422 00004263 7406                    	je	short convdone
 38423 00004265 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 38424 00004267 7402                    	je	short convdone
 38425                                  ;endif
 38426                                  	; 02/11/2022
 38427 00004269 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 38428                                  convdone:
 38429 0000426B 1F                      	pop	ds
 38430 0000426C 5E                      	pop	si
 38431 0000426D 59                      	pop	cx
 38432 0000426E C3                      	retn

 38542                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38543 000042DE 3C0A                    	cmp	al,10
 38544 000042E0 F5                      	cmc
 38545                                  notdig:
 38546                                  	;stc
 38547                                  notdig2:
 38548 000042E1 C3                      	retn
 38549                                  
 38550                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38551                                  ;
 38552                                  ; procedure : getnum
 38553                                  ;
 38554                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 38555                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 38556                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 38557                                  ;
 38558                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38559                                  
 38560                                  getnum:
 38561 000042E2 53                      	push	bx
 38562 000042E3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 38563                                  b2:
 38564 000042E5 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 38565 000042E8 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 38566                                  
 38567 000042EA 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 38568 000042EB 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 38569                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 38570                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38571 000042EC B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 38572 000042EE F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 38573 000042F0 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 38574 000042F1 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 38575 000042F3 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 38576 000042F6 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 38577                                  
 38578 000042F8 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 38579                                  
 38580 000042F9 E830FF                  	call	getchr			; get next digit
 38581 000042FC 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 38582 000042FE 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 38583 00004300 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 38584 00004302 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 38585 00004304 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 38586 00004306 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 38587 00004308 7417                    	je	short b15
 38588 0000430A 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 38589 0000430F 7410                    	je	short b15
 38590 00004311 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 38591                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38592                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38593                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 38594                                  	;nop
 38595 00004313 740C                    	je	short b15
 38596 00004315 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 38597 00004317 7408                    	je	short b15
 38598 00004319 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 38599 0000431B 7404                    	je	short b15
 38600 0000431D 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 38601 0000431F 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 38602                                  b15:
 38603 00004321 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 38604 00004326 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 38605                                  b1:
 38606 0000432B 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 38607 0000432D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 38608 0000432F 5B                      	pop	bx
 38609 00004330 C3                      	retn
 38610                                  badnum:
 38611                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 38612                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 38613 00004331 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 38614                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 38615 00004333 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 38616 00004337 5B                      	pop	bx
 38617 00004338 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 38618 00004339 C3                      	retn
 38619                                  
 38620                                  ;****************************************************************************
 38621                                  
 38622                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 38623                                  
 38624                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38625                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 38626                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 38627                                  ;	si = 0
 38628                                  ;	ax = country id
 38629                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 38630                                  ;	bx = file handle
 38631                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 38632                                  ;
 38633                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 38634                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 38635                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 38636                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 38637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38638                                  
 38639                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38640                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 38641                                  
 38642                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38643                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)
 38644                                  
 38645 0000433A 57                      	push	di
 38646 0000433B 50                      	push	ax
 38647 0000433C 52                      	push	dx
 38648                                  
 38649 0000433D 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 38650 0000433F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 38651 00004341 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 38652 00004344 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 38653 00004347 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38654                                  
 38655 00004349 06                      	push	es
 38656 0000434A 56                      	push	si
 38657                                  
 38658 0000434B 0E                      	push	cs
 38659 0000434C 07                      	pop	es
 38660                                  
 38661 0000434D BF[9E45]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 38662 00004350 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 38663 00004353 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 38664                                  
 38665 00004355 5E                      	pop	si
 38666 00004356 07                      	pop	es
 38667 00004357 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 38668                                  
 38669 00004359 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 38670 0000435C 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 38671 0000435F 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 38672                                  
 38673 00004361 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 38674 00004362 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 38675 00004364 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 38676 00004367 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 38677 0000436A E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 38678 0000436D 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38679                                  
 38680 0000436F 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 38681 00004371 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 38682 00004375 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38683                                  
 38684 00004377 46                      	inc	si
 38685 00004378 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 38686 00004379 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 38687 0000437A 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 38688 0000437B 5F                      	pop	di
 38689                                  
 38690                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 38691 0000437C 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 38692 0000437F 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 38693                                  
 38694                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 38695                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 38696                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38697 00004381 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 38698 00004383 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 38699 00004385 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 38700 00004388 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 38701                                  
 38702                                  setdoscntry_next:
 38703 0000438A 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 38704 0000438C 46                      	inc	si
 38705 0000438D 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 38706 0000438E E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 38707                                  
 38708                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 38709                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38710 00004390 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 38711                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 38712 00004391 F9                      	stc
 38713 00004392 C3                      	retn
 38714                                  
 38715                                  setdosdata_fail:
 38716 00004393 5E                      	pop	si

 38720

 38722 00004398 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 38723

 38726 000043A0 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data

 38728 000043A6 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes

 38730 000043AC 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail

 38733 000043B0 46                      	inc	si
 38734 000043B1 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 38735                                  
 38736                                  setdoscntry_data:

 38750 000043C9 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38751

 38753 000043CE B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to

 38755 000043D3 F9                      	stc
 38756 000043D4 CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 38757 000043D6 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 38758                                  
 38759 000043D8 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38760 000043DA 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019

 38765 000043E5 F9                      	stc

 38767 000043E8 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38768

 38772 000043F0 5E                      	pop	si

 38774 000043F4 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 38775 000043F7 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 38776 000043F9 F9                      	stc
 38777 000043FA CD21                    	int	21h
 38778 000043FC 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 38779                                  
 38780 000043FE 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 38781 00004400 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 38782                                  
 38783 00004402 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 38784 00004405 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 38785 00004408 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 38786 0000440A 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 38787 0000440B 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 38788 0000440C 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 38789 00004410 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 38790                                  
 38791                                  	;if	bugfix
 38792 00004412 E83100                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 38793                                  	;endif

 38795 00004415 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 38796 00004417 7511                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry

 38829 0000443E 46                      	inc	si

 38885                                  getcountrydestination:
 38886                                  
 38887                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38888                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 38889                                  ;
 38890                                  ;input: al - data id
 38891                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 38892                                  ;on return:
 38893                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 38894                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 38895                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38896                                  
 38897                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38898                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 38899                                  
 38900                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38901                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 38902                                  
 38903 0000445F 51                      	push	cx
 38904                                  	;add	di,74
 38905 00004460 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 38906                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 38907 00004463 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 38908 00004466 47                      	inc	di
 38909 00004467 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 38910                                  
 38911                                  getcntrydest:
 38912 00004468 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 38913 0000446B 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 38914                                  
 38915 0000446D 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 38916 00004471 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 38917                                  
 38918 00004473 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 38919 00004476 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 38920                                  
 38921                                  getcntrydest_1:
 38922                                  	;add	di,41
 38923 00004478 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 38924                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 38925 0000447B E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 38926 0000447D F9                      	stc
 38927                                  	;jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38928                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 38929                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38930 0000447E 59                      	pop	cx
 38931 0000447F C3                      	retn
 38932                                  
 38933                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 38934                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38935 00004480 47                      	inc	di
 38936                                  
 38937                                  ;	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 38938                                  ;	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 38939                                  ;
 38940                                  ;	;inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 38941                                  ;	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 38942                                  
 38943                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38944 00004481 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 38945 00004483 74F9                    	je	short getcntrydest_exit
 38946                                  
 38947                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 38948                                  	;les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 38949                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38950 00004485 26C43D                  	les	di,[es:di]
 38951                                  ;getcntrydest_exit:
 38952 00004488 59                      	pop	cx
 38953 00004489 C3                      	retn
 38954                                  
 38955                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38956                                  
 38957                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 38958                                  
 38959                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38960                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 38961                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 38962                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 38963                                  ;
 38964                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 38965                                  ;	 be moved.
 38966                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 38967                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 38968                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 38969                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 38970                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 38971                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 38972                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38973                                  
 38974 0000448A 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 38975 0000448B B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 38976 0000448E F9                      	stc
 38977 0000448F CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 38978 00004491 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 38979 00004492 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 38980                                  
 38981 00004494 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 38982 00004496 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 38983 00004498 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 38984 0000449A F9                      	stc
 38985 0000449B CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 38986                                  ricb_exit:
 38987 0000449D C3                      	retn
 38988

 38995                                  set_country_path:
 38996                                  
 38997                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38998                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 38999                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39000                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39001                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39002                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39003                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39004                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39005                                  
 39006                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39007                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39008                                  
 39009                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39010                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39011                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39012                                  
 39013                                  	push	si
 39014                                  
 39015                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39016                                  	push	es
 39017                                  	pop	ds
 39018                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39019                                  
 39020                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39021                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39022                                  
 39023                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39024                                  	inc	si
 39025                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39026                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39027                                  
 39028                                  scp_default_drv:
 39029                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39030                                  	int	21h
 39031                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39032                                  
 39033                                  scp_setdrv:
 39034                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39035                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39036                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39037                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39038                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39039                                  
 39040                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39041                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39042                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39043                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39044                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39045                                  
 39046                                  scp_root_dir:
 39047                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39048                                  scp_path:
 39049                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39050                                  
 39051                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39052                                  scpath_exit:
 39053                                  
 39054                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39055                                  	push	es
 39056                                  	pop	ds
 39057                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39058                                  
 39059                                  	pop	si
 39060                                  	retn
 39061                                  
 39062                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39063                                  
 39064                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39065                                  
 39066                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39067                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39068                                  ;carry set if not.
 39069                                  
 39070                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39071                                  
 39072                                  	push	ax
 39073                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39074                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39075                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39076                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39077                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39078                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39079                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39080                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39081                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39082                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39083                                  
 39084                                  cdletter_no:
 39085                                  	stc
 39086                                  cdletter_exit:
 39087                                  	pop	ax
 39088                                  	retn
 39089                                  
 39090                                  %endif
 39091                                  
 39092                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39093                                  
 39094                                  move_asciiz:
 39095                                  
 39096                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 39097                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 39098                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 39099                                  
 39100                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39101                                  	; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4F40h)
 39102                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:5187h)
 39103                                  
 39104                                  masciiz_loop:
 39105                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39106 0000449E F604FF                  	test	byte [si],0FFh
 39107 000044A1 A4                      	movsb
 39108                                  	;cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 39109                                  	;jne	short masciiz_loop
 39110 000044A2 75FA                    	jnz	short masciiz_loop ; 10/09/2023
 39111 000044A4 C3                      	retn
 39112                                  
 39113                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39114                                  
 39115                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 39116                                  ;
 39117                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 39118                                  
 39119                                  badfil:
 39120 000044A5 0E                      	push	cs
 39121 000044A6 07                      	pop	es
 39122                                  
 39123 000044A7 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 39124                                  badload:
 39125 000044A9 BA[614A]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 39126 000044AC BB[1E4A]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 39127                                  prnerr:
 39128 000044AF 0E                      	push	cs
 39129 000044B0 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 39130 000044B1 E81D00                  	call	print
 39131                                  prn1:
 39132 000044B4 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 39133 000044B7 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 39134 000044B9 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 39135 000044BB B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 39136 000044BD CD21                    	int	21h
 39137 000044BF 46                      	inc	si
 39138 000044C0 EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 39139                                  prn2:
 39140 000044C2 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 39141 000044C4 E80A00                  	call	print
 39142                                  	; 11/12/2022
 39143                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 39144 000044C7 803E[5503]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1
 39145                                  				; suppress line number when handling command.com
 39146                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1 
 39147 000044CC 7407                    	je	short prnexit
 39148                                  	
 39149                                  	; 18/12/2022
 39150                                  	;call	error_line
 39151 000044CE E966E4                  	jmp	error_line
 39152                                  ;prnexit:
 39153                                  	;retn
 39154                                  
 39155                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39156                                  
 39157                                  print:
 39158 000044D1 B409                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_STRING_OUTPUT ; 9
 39159 000044D3 CD21                    	int	21h
 39160                                  prnexit:	; 18/12/2022
 39161 000044D5 C3                      	retn
 39162

 39165                                  ;  open device pointed to by dx, al has access code
 39166                                  ;   if unable to open do a device open null device instead

 39179                                  	;retn

 39185 000044E1 CD21                    	int	21h
 39186                                  of_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 39187 000044E3 C3                      	retn

 39195                                  	;xor	ax,ax

 39197                                  	; 11/12/2022

 39199                                  
 39200 000044E9 CD21                    	int	21h
 39201                                  
 39202 000044EB F6C280                  	test	dl,10000000b ; 80h
 39203 000044EE 75F3                    	jnz	short of_retn
 39204                                  
 39205 000044F0 B43E                    	mov	ah,CLOSE ; 3Eh
 39206 000044F2 CD21                    	int	21h
